atk-s0506a:2323_3: Tato eva bahibhūtehi rūpādiārammaṇehi apakkamitvā visayajjhatte nibbāne ca ogāḷhacittatāya abahiggatamānaso.
atk-s0506a:2323_4: Micchāgāhamocanabhayena vipallāsavantehi micchādiṭṭhikehi bhāyitabbato tesañca bhayajananato bhayabheravo.
atk-s0506a:2323_5: Payogāsayavipannehi anupagamanīyato ca kenacipi anāsādanīyato ca durāsado.
atk-s0506a:2323_8: Pupphaṃ odumbaraṃ yathāti yathā nāma udumbare bhavaṃ pupphaṃ dullabhadassanaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2324_1: So tathāgato mudūhi vācāhi saṇhāya vācāya “rajjumāle”ti maṃ ālapitvā āmantetvā saraṇaṃ gaccha tathāgatanti
atk-s0506a:2324_2: “tathā āgato”tiādinā tathāgataṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāti maṃ avoca abhāsīti yojanā.
atk-s0506a:2325_10: Sabbasokāpanūdananti ñātibyasanādivasena uppajjanakassa sabbassāpi sokassa vinodanaṃ giraṃ sutvāna pasannacittā ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0506a:2325_11: Sabbametaṃ dānakathaṃ ādiṃ katvā ussakkitvā nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ vibhāvanavasena pavattitaṃ bhagavato anupubbikathaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0506a:2326_1: heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā uparidesanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamanena kammakkhamacittaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2326_7: sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya saha upāyena pavattinivattiyo upadisīti attho.
atk-s0506a:2327_1: Tattha idaṃ dukkhanti maṃvocāti idaṃ taṇhāvajjaṃ tebhūmakaṃ dhammajātaṃ bādhakasabhāvattā kucchikaṃ hutvā
atk-s0506a:2327_2: tucchasabhāvattā tathattā ca dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti mayhaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0506a:2327_3: Ayaṃ dukkhassa sambhavoti ayaṃ āmataṇhādibhedā taṇhā yathāvuttassa dukkhassa sambhavo pabhavo uppatti hetu samudayo ariyasaccanti.
atk-s0506a:2327_4: Dukkhanirodhoti dukkhassa santibhāvo asaṅkhatadhātu nirodho ariyasaccanti.
atk-s0506a:2327_5: Antadvayassa parivajjanato añjaso nibbānagāminipaṭipadābhāvato amatogadho maggo ariyasaccanti maṃ avocāti sambandho.
atk-s0506a:2328_3: Ovādamhi ahaṃ ṭhitāti yathāvutte ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṃ sikkhāttayapāripūriyā saccapaṭivedhena ahaṃ patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0506a:2328_9: adhigatānaṃ acavanahetutāya accutaṃ nibbānaṃ padaṃ ajjhagā adhigañchi,
atk-s0506a:2328_10: sā ekaṃsena satthu ovāde patiṭṭhitā nāmāti.
atk-s0506a:2329_5: suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti etasmiṃ sammādassane acalā kenaci acālanīyā.
atk-s0506a:2329_9: “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”tiādinā tassa saṅghe ca saccābhisamayasaṅkhātena mūlena jātamūlā saddhā,
atk-s0506a:2329_11: Tato eva dhītā buddhassa orasāti sammāsambuddhassa ure vāyāmajanitābhijātitāya orasaputtī.
atk-s0506a:2330_1: Sāhaṃ ramāmīti sā ahaṃ tadā ariyāya jātiyā idāni devūpapattiyā āgatā maggaratiyā phalaratiyā ca ramāmi,
atk-s0506a:2330_6: naccanagāyanakālesu sarīrassa sarassa ca mudubhāvāvahaṃ gandhapānaṃ sandhāya vadati.“Madhumādava”ntipi paṭhanti,
atk-s0506a:2330_7: ādavaṃ yāvadavaṃ yāvadeva davatthaṃ madhuraṃ pivāmīti attho.
atk-s0506a:2331_1: Puññakkhettānamākarāti sadevakassa lokassa puññakkhettabhūtānaṃ ariyānaṃ maggaphalaṭṭhānaṃ ariyasaṅghassa ākarā uppattiṭṭhānaṃ tathāgatā.
atk-s0506a:2332_0: Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno attanā ca devatāya ca pavattitaṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ manussalokaṃ āgantvā bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0506a:2332_1: Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0506a:2341_0: Mahārathavagge ko me vandati pādānīti maṇḍūkadevaputtavimānaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2341_2: Bhagavā campāyaṃ viharati gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre.
atk-s0506a:2341_3: So paccūsavelāyaṃ buddhāciṇṇaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya veneyyabandhave satte
atk-s0506a:2341_4: volokento addasa “ajja mayi sāyanhasamaye dhammaṃ desente eko maṇḍūko mama sare nimittaṃ gaṇhanto parūpakkamena
atk-s0506a:2341_5: maritvā devaloke nibbattitvā mahatā devaparivārena mahājanassa passantasseva āgamissati,
atk-s0506a:2341_6: tattha bahūnaṃ dhammābhisamayo bhavissatī”ti disvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya mahatā
atk-s0506a:2341_8: bhikkhūnaṃ sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ katvā katabhattakicco vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhikkhūsu vattaṃ dassetvā,
atk-s0506a:2341_9: attano attano divāṭṭhānaṃ gatesu gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā phalasamāpattisukhena divasabhāgaṃ khepetvā,
atk-s0506a:2341_10: sāyanhasamaye catūsu parisāsu sannipatitāsu surabhigandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena
atk-s0506a:2341_11: pokkharaṇitīre dhammasabhāmaṇḍapaṃ pavisitvā alaṅkatavarabuddhāsane nisinno manosilātale sīhanādaṃ nadanto
atk-s0506a:2341_12: achambhītakesarasīho viya aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmassaraṃ nicchārento acinteyyena buddhānubhāvena anupamāya
atk-s0506a:2342_0: Tasmiñca khaṇe eko maṇḍūko pokkharaṇito āgantvā “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti dhammasaññāya sare nimittaṃ gaṇhanto parisapariyante nipajji.
atk-s0506a:2342_1: Atheko vacchapālo taṃ padesaṃ āgato satthāraṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ parisañca paramena upasamena dhammaṃ suṇantaṃ
atk-s0506a:2342_2: disvā taggatamānaso daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto maṇḍūkaṃ anoloketvā tassa sīse sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:2342_3: So dhammasaññāya pasannacitto tāvadeva kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike kanakavimāne nibbattitvā
atk-s0506a:2342_4: suttappabuddho viya tattha accharāsaṅghaparivutaṃ attānaṃ disvā “kuto nu kho idha ahaṃ nibbatto”ti āvajjento
atk-s0506a:2342_7: kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ akāsi”nti upadhārento aññaṃ na addasa aññatra bhagavato sare nimittaggāhā.
atk-s0506a:2342_8: So tāvadeva saha vimānena āgantvā vimānato otaritvā,
atk-s0506a:2342_9: mahājanassa passantasseva mahatā parivārena mahantena dibbānubhāvena upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0506a:2342_10: bhagavato pāde sirasā vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:2342_11: Atha naṃ bhagavā jānantova mahājanassa kammaphalaṃ buddhānubhāvañca paccakkhaṃ kātuṃ –
atk-s0506a:2344_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2346_6: Yasasāti iminā īdisena parivārena paricchedena ca.
atk-s0506a:2347_0: Atha devaputto attano purimajātiādiṃ āvi karonto imāhi gāthāhi byākāsi –
atk-s0506a:2353_0: Ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṃ passa jutiñca me.
atk-s0506a:2355_0: “Ye ca te dīghamaddhānaṃ, dhammaṃ assosuṃ gotama;
atk-s0506a:2356_0: Pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare”ti.
atk-s0506a:2357_3: Udake maṇḍūkoti etena uddhumāyikādikassa thale maṇḍūkassa nivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0506a:2357_8: Udakacārīpi hi koci kacchapādi avārigocaropi hotīti “vārigocaro”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2357_9: Tava dhammaṃ suṇantassāti brahmassarena karavīkarutamañjunā desentassa tava dhammaṃ “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti sare nimittaggāhavasena suṇantassa,
atk-s0506a:2357_11: Avadhī vacchapālakoti vacche rakkhanto gopāladārako mama samīpaṃ āgantvā daṇḍamolubbhitvā tiṭṭhanto mama sīse daṇḍaṃ sannirumbhitvā maṃ māresi.
atk-s0506a:2358_1: Muhuttaṃ cittapasādassāti tava dhamme muhuttamattaṃ uppannassa cittapasādassa hetubhūtassa iddhinti samiddhiṃ,
atk-s0506a:2359_9: gotama bhagavā ahaṃ viya ittarameva kālaṃ asuṇitvā ye pana katapuññā ciraṃ kālaṃ tava dhammaṃ assosuṃ sotuṃ labhiṃsu,
atk-s0506a:2359_10: te dīgharattaṃ saṃsārabyasanābhibhūtā ime sattā yattha gantvā na soceyyuṃ,
atk-s0506a:2359_11: taṃ asokaṃ sassatabhāvena acalaṃ santipadaṃ pattā eva,
atk-s0506a:2360_0: Athassa bhagavā sampattaparisāya ca upanissayasampattiṃ oloketvā vitthārena dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0506a:2360_3: Devaputto bhagavantaṃ vanditvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ca añjaliṃ katvā saha parivārena devalokameva gatoti.
atk-s0506a:2363_3: Tena samayena bārāṇasiyaṃ saddhāsampannassa kulassa putto nandiyo nāma upāsako ahosi saddhāsampanno dāyako dānapati saṅghupaṭṭhāko.
atk-s0506a:2363_4: Athassa mātāpitaro sammukhagehato mātuladhītaraṃ revatiṃ nāma kaññaṃ ānetukāmā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0506a:2363_8: tvaṃ imaṃ gehaṃ āgantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ haritena gomayena upalimpitvā āsanāni paññāpehi,
atk-s0506a:2363_10: bhikkhūnaṃ āgatakāle vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā nisīdāpetvā dhamakaraṇena pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā bhuttakāle pattāni dhovāhi,
atk-s0506a:2363_13: Atha naṃ “ovādakkhamā jātā”ti puttassa ārocetvā tena “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchite divasaṃ ṭhapetvā āvāhaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0506a:2364_0: Atha naṃ nandiyo āha “sace bhikkhusaṅghaṃ mātāpitaro ca me upaṭṭhahissasi,
atk-s0506a:2364_3: Sā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā kiñci kālaṃ saddhā viya hutvā bhattāraṃ anavattentī dve putte vijāyi.
atk-s0506a:2364_6: Nandiyopi mahādānapati hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0506a:2364_8: Isipatanamahāvihāre catūhi gabbhehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ catusālaṃ kāretvā mañcapīṭhādīni attharāpetvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0506a:2364_9: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā tathāgatassa hatthe dakkhiṇodakaṃ pātetvā niyyādesi,
atk-s0506a:2364_10: saha dakkhiṇodakadānena tāvatiṃsabhavane āyāmato ca vitthārato ca samantā dvādasayojaniko yojanasatubbedho
atk-s0506a:2365_0: Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno devacārikaṃ caranto taṃ pāsādaṃ disvā attānaṃ vandituṃ āgate devaputte pucchi “kassāyaṃ pāsādo”ti? “Imassa, bhante,
atk-s0506a:2365_1: pāsādassa sāmiko manussaloke bārāṇasiyaṃ nandiyo nāma kuṭumbiyaputto saṅghassa isipatanamahāvihāre catusālaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0506a:2365_4: mayaṃ bārāṇasiyaṃ nandiyassa nāma upāsakassa paricārikā bhavituṃ idha nibbattā,
atk-s0506a:2365_5: tassa evaṃ vadetha “tuyhaṃ paricārikā bhavituṃ nibbattā,
atk-s0506a:2365_7: devalokasampatti nāma mattikābhājanaṃ bhinditvā suvaṇṇabhājanassa gahaṇaṃ viya atimanāpa’nti vatvā idhāgamanatthāya tassa vadethā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0506a:2365_8: Thero “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā sahasā devalokato āgantvā catuparisamajjhe bhagavantaṃ pucchi “nibbattati nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0506a:2365_11: nandiyassa devaloke nibbattā dibbasampatti sāmaṃ diṭṭhā,
atk-s0506a:2365_14: Athassa satthā “yathā ciraṃ vippavasitvā āgataṃ purisaṃ mittabandhavā abhinandanti sampaṭicchanti,
atk-s0506a:2365_15: evaṃ katapuññaṃ puggalaṃ ito paralokaṃ gataṃ sakāni puññāni sampattihatthehi sampaṭicchanti paṭiggaṇhantī”ti dassento –
atk-s0506a:2371_0: Puññāni paṭiggaṇhanti, piyaṃ ñātīva āgata”nti. – gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0506a:2372_0: Nandiyo taṃ sutvā bhiyyosomattāya dānāni deti,
atk-s0506a:2372_3: mayā paṭṭhapitaṃ saṅghassa dānaṃ anāthānaṃ pākavattañca tvaṃ appamattā pavatteyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2372_5: So pavāsagatopi yattha yattha vāsaṃ kappeti,
atk-s0506a:2372_6: tattha tattha bhikkhūnaṃ anāthānañca yathāvibhavaṃ dānaṃ detiyeva.
atk-s0506a:2372_7: Tassa anukampāya khīṇāsavā dūratopi āgantvā dānaṃ sampaṭicchanti.
atk-s0506a:2372_8: Revatī pana tasmiṃ gate katipāhameva dānaṃ pavattetvā anāthānaṃ bhattaṃ upacchindi,
atk-s0506a:2372_10: Bhikkhūnaṃ bhuttaṭṭhāne attanā bhuttāvasesāni sitthāni macchamaṃsakhaṇḍamissakāni calakaṭṭhikāni ca pakiritvā
atk-s0506a:2373_0: Atha nandiyo vohārakasiddhi yathālābho āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā revatiṃ gehato nīharitvā gehaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0506a:2373_1: Dutiyadivase buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattetvā niccabhattaṃ anāthabhattañca sammadeva pavattesi,
atk-s0506a:2373_2: attano sahāyehi upanītaṃ revatiṃ ghāsacchādanaparamatāya ṭhapesi.
atk-s0506a:2373_3: So aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane attano vimāneyeva nibbatti.
atk-s0506a:2373_4: Revatī pana sabbaṃ dānaṃ pacchinditvā “imesaṃ vasena mayhaṃ lābhasakkāro parihāyī”ti bhikkhusaṅghaṃ akkosantī paribhāsantī vicarati.
atk-s0506a:2373_5: Atha vessavaṇo dve yakkhe āṇāpesi “gacchatha, bhaṇe,
atk-s0506a:2373_6: bārāṇasinagare ugghosatha “ito sattame divase revatī jīvantīyeva niraye pakkhipīyatī’ti”.
atk-s0506a:2373_7: Taṃ sutvā mahājano saṃvegajāto bhītatasito ahosi.
atk-s0506a:2374_0: Atha revatī pana pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā dvāraṃ thaketvā nisīdi.
atk-s0506a:2374_1: Sattame divase tassā pāpakammasañcoditena vessavaṇena raññā āṇattā jalitakapilakesamassukā cipiṭavirūpanāsikā
atk-s0506a:2374_2: pariṇatadāṭhā lohitakkhā sajaladharasamānavaṇṇā ativiya bhayānakarūpā dve yakkhā upagantvā “uṭṭhehi,  revate,
atk-s0506a:2374_3: supāpadhamme”tiādīni vadantā nānābāhāsu gahetvā “mahājano passatū”ti sakalanagare vīthito vīthiṃ paribbhamāpetvā
atk-s0506a:2374_4: ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ netvā nandiyassa vimānaṃ sampattiñcassā dassetvā taṃ vilapantiṃyeva
atk-s0506a:2377_0: Nessāma taṃ yattha thunanti duggatā, samappitā nerayikā dukhenā”ti.
atk-s0506a:2378_1: na dānesa pāsādo taṃ nirayabhayato rakkhituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0506a:2378_5: Yasmā tvaṃ ariyānaṃ akkosanaparibhāsanādinā suṭṭu lāmakapāpadhammā,
atk-s0506a:2378_6: yasmā ca apārutaṃ dvāraṃ nirayassa tava pavesanatthaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2378_8: Adānasīleti kassaci kiñci na dānasīle kadariye maccharinī,
atk-s0506a:2378_10: Yasmā dānasīlānaṃ amaccharīnaṃ tava sāmikasadisānaṃ sugatiyaṃ nivāso,
atk-s0506a:2378_11: tādisānaṃ pana adānasīlānaṃ maccharīnaṃ niraye nivāso,
atk-s0506a:2378_13: muhuttamattampi tava idha ṭhātuṃ na dassāmīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0506a:2378_15: Nerayikāti nirayadukkhena samappitā samaṅgībhūtā yasmiṃ niraye thunanti,
atk-s0506a:2378_18: tattha taṃ nessāma nayissāma khipissāmāti yojanā.
atk-s0506a:2380_0: “Icceva vatvāna yamassa dūtā, te dve yakkhā lohitakkhā brahantā;
atk-s0506a:2381_0: Paccekabāhāsu gahetvā revataṃ, pakkāmayuṃ devagaṇassa santike”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2383_0: Tattha icceva vatvānāti iti eva “uṭṭhehī”tiādinā vatvā,
atk-s0506a:2383_2: Yamassa dūtāti appaṭisedhaniyatassa yamassa rañño dūtasadisā.
atk-s0506a:2383_6: kāraṃ “yamassā”ti padena sambandhitvā “vessavaṇassa dūtā”ti atthaṃ vadanti,
atk-s0506a:2383_8: Na hi na yamadūtatāya vessavaṇassa dūtāti sijjhati.
atk-s0506a:2384_0: Evaṃ tehi yakkhehi tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ netvā nandiyavimānassa avidūre ṭhapitā revatī taṃ sūriyamaṇḍalasadisaṃ ativiya pabhassaraṃ disvā –
atk-s0506a:2390_0: Taṃ dissati suriyasamānavaṇṇaṃ, ko modati saggapatto vimāne”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2393_0: “Bārāṇasiyaṃ nandiyo nāmāsi, upāsako amaccharī dānapati vadaññū;
atk-s0506a:2397_0: Taṃ dissati sūriyasamānavaṇṇaṃ, so modati saggapatto vimāne”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2399_2: Ubhato vimānanti vimānaṃ ubhato anto ceva bahi ca saṅgītādīhi upecca sobhayanti.
atk-s0506a:2403_0: Bhattu vimāne ramissāmi dānahaṃ, na patthaye nirayaṃ dassanāyā”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2404_4: Sabbakulassa issarā bhattūti mama bhattu nandiyassa sabbakuṭumbikassa issarā sāminī ahosiṃ,
atk-s0506a:2404_5: tasmā idānipi vimāne issarā bhavissāmīti āha.
atk-s0506a:2404_6: Vimāne ramissāmi dānahanti evaṃ palobhetumeva hi taṃ te tattha nesuṃ.
atk-s0506a:2404_7: Na patthaye nirayaṃ dassanāyāti yaṃ pana nirayaṃ maṃ tumhe netukāmā,
atk-s0506a:2405_0: Evaṃ vadantimeva “tvaṃ taṃ patthehi vā mā vā, kiṃ tava patthanāyā”ti nirayasamīpaṃ netvā –
atk-s0506a:2407_0: “Eso te nirayo supāpadhamme, puññaṃ tayā akataṃ jīvaloke;
atk-s0506a:2408_0: Na hi maccharī rosako pāpadhammo, saggūpagānaṃ labhati sahabyata”nti. –
atk-s0506a:2409_5: yasmā manussaloke appamattakampi tayā puññaṃ nāma na kataṃ,
atk-s0506a:2409_6: evaṃ akatapuñño pana tādiso satto maccharī attano sampattinigūhanalakkhaṇena maccharena samannāgato,
atk-s0506a:2409_8: lobhādīhi pāpadhammehi samaṅgībhāvato pāpadhammo saggūpagānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ sahabhāvaṃ na labhatīti yojanā.
atk-s0506a:2410_0: Evaṃ pana vatvā te dve yakkhā tatthevantaradhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0506a:2410_1: Taṃsadise pana dve nirayapāle saṃsavake nāma gūthaniraye pakkhipituṃ ākaḍḍhante passitvā –
atk-s0506a:2418_0: Tasmiṃ kathite tattha attano nibbattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ pucchantī –
atk-s0506a:2420_0: “Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
atk-s0506a:2421_0: Kena saṃsavako laddho, gambhīro sataporiso”ti. – āha;
atk-s0506a:2424_0: Musāvādena vañcesi, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ tayā”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2425_0: Tassā taṃ kammaṃ kathetvā puna te –
atk-s0506a:2429_1: Tattha saṃsavako nāmāti niccakālaṃ gūthamuttādiasucissa saṃsavanato paggharaṇato saṃsavako nāma.
atk-s0506a:2430_0: Na kevalaṃ tuyhaṃ idha saṃsavakalābho eva,
atk-s0506a:2430_1: atha kho ettha anekāni vassasahassāni paccitvā uttiṇṇāya hatthacchedādilābhopīti dassetuṃ –
atk-s0506a:2432_0: “Hatthepi chindanti athopi pāde, kaṇṇepi chindanti athopi nāsaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2433_0: Athopi kākoḷagaṇā samecca, saṅgamma khādanti viphandamāna”nti. –
atk-s0506a:2434_2: Te kirassā tigāvutappamāṇe sarīre anekasatāni anekasahassāni patitvā tālakkhandhaparimāṇehi sunisitaggehi
atk-s0506a:2435_0: Puna sā manussalokaṃ paccānayanāya yācanādivasena taṃ taṃ vippalapi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0506a:2437_0: “Sādhu kho maṃ paṭinetha, kāhāmi kusalaṃ bahuṃ;
atk-s0506a:2439_0: Yaṃ katvā sukhitā honti, na ca pacchānutappare”ti.
atk-s0506a:2446_0: “Ko devalokato manussalokaṃ, gantvāna puṭṭho me evaṃ vadeyya;
atk-s0506a:2448_0: Na hi maccharī rosako pāpadhammo, saggūpagānaṃ labhati sahabyataṃ.
atk-s0506a:2450_0: “Sāhaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
atk-s0506a:2461_0: Na ca dāne pamajjissaṃ, sāmaṃ diṭṭhamidaṃ mayā”ti.
atk-s0506a:2468_0: Vitathena ca sāmikaṃ vañcayitvā, paccāmahaṃ niraye ghorarūpe”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2469_1: Tattha “ahaṃ pure maccharinī”ti gāthā niraye nibbattāya vuttā,
atk-s0506a:2470_0: Bhikkhū revatiyā yakkhehi gahetvā nītabhāvaṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0506a:2470_1: Taṃ sutvā bhagavā ādito paṭṭhāya imaṃ vatthuṃ kathetvā upari vitthārena dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0506a:2470_4: yasmā pana revatī vimānadevatā na hoti,
atk-s0506a:2473_3: Tena samayena setabyāyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa kicchāladdho putto chatto nāma brāhmaṇamāṇavo ahosi.
atk-s0506a:2473_4: So vayappatto pitarā pesito ukkaṭṭhaṃ gantvā brāhmaṇassa pokkharasātissa santike medhāvitāya analasatāya
atk-s0506a:2473_5: ca na cireneva mante vijjāṭṭhānāni ca uggahetvā brāhmaṇasippe nipphattiṃ patto.
atk-s0506a:2473_6: So ācariyaṃ abhivādetvā “mayā tumhākaṃ santike sippaṃ sikkhitaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2473_10: Chattamāṇavo ācariyaṃ abhivādetvā setabyaṃ gantvā mātāpitaro vanditvā tehi abhinandiyamāno katapaṭisanthāro
atk-s0506a:2473_15: sve gamissasī”ti vatvā kahāpaṇe nīharitvā bhaṇḍikaṃ bandhāpetvā ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0506a:2473_16: Corā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā chattamāṇavakassa gamanamagge aññatarasmiṃ vanagahane nilīnā acchiṃsu “māṇavaṃ māretvā kahāpaṇe gaṇhissāmā”ti.
atk-s0506a:2474_0: Bhagavā paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento chattamāṇavakassa saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2474_2: tato saha vimānena āgatassa tattha sannipatitaparisāya ca dhammābhisamayaṃ disvā paṭhamatarameva gantvā
atk-s0506a:2474_4: Māṇavo ācariyadhanaṃ gahetvā setabyato ukkaṭṭhābhimukho gacchanto antarāmagge bhagavantaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:2474_7: gamissāmi mayhaṃ ācariyassa pokkharasātissa garudakkhiṇaṃ dātu”nti āha.
atk-s0506a:2474_11: kimatthiyāni panetāni kīdisāni cā”ti vutte “idamīdisa”nti saraṇagamanassa sīlasamādānassa ca phalānisaṃsaṃ vibhāvetvā “uggaṇhāhi tāva, māṇavaka,
atk-s0506a:2474_13: kathetha bhante bhagavā”ti tena yācito tassa ruciyā anurūpaṃ gāthābandhavasena saraṇagamanavidhiṃ dassento –
atk-s0506a:2476_0: “Yo vadataṃ pavaro manujesu, sakyamunī bhagavā katakicco;
atk-s0506a:2482_0: “Yattha ca dinna mahapphalamāhu, catūsu sucīsu purisayugesu;
atk-s0506a:2483_0: Aṭṭha ca puggala dhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2485_7: Bhagavā pana devamanussānampi brahmānampi sabbesampi sattānaṃ pavaroyeva,
atk-s0506a:2485_8: bhagavato ca carimabhave manussesu uppannatāya vuttaṃ “manujesū”ti.
atk-s0506a:2485_11: kāyamoneyyādīhi samannāgatato anavasesassa ca ñeyyassa munanato muni cāti sakyamuni.
atk-s0506a:2485_13: Catūhi maggehi kātabbassa pariññādipabhedassa soḷasavidhassa kiccassa katattā nipphāditattā katakicco.
atk-s0506a:2485_14: Pāraṃ sakkāyassa paratīraṃ nibbānaṃ gato sayambhuñāṇena adhigatoti pāragato.
atk-s0506a:2485_22: Taṃ sugataṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ saraṇatthaṃ saraṇāya parāyaṇāya apāyadukkhavaṭṭadukkhaparittāṇāya upehi upagaccha,
atk-s0506a:2485_23: ajja paṭṭhāya ahitanivattanena hitasaṃvaḍḍhanena “ayaṃ me bhagavā saraṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ gati paṭisaraṇa”nti bhaja seva,
atk-s0506a:2486_2: Tena hi ariyā anādikālabhāvitampi rāgaṃ virajjenti.
atk-s0506a:2486_4: Tañhi ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya avasiṭṭhānañca sokanimittānaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbaso paṭippassambhanato “anejaṃ asoka”nti ca vuccati.
atk-s0506a:2486_14: Savanavelāyaṃ upaparikkhaṇavelāyaṃ paṭipajjanavelāyanti sabbadāpi iṭṭhamevāti madhuraṃ.
atk-s0506a:2486_15: Sabbaññutaññāṇasannissayāya paṭibhānasampadāya pavattitattā suppavattibhāvato nipuṇabhāvato ca paguṇaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2486_16: Vibhajitabbassa atthassa khandhādivasena kusalādivasena uddesādivasena ca suṭṭhu vibhajanato suvibhattaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2486_18: Teneva hissa āpāthakāle viya vimaddanakālepi kathentassa viya suṇantassāpi sammukhībhāvato ubhatopaccakkhatāya dassanatthaṃ “ima”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2486_21: Pariyattidhammopi hi saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhānamattāyapi yathāvapaṭipattiyā apāyadukkhapātato dhāreti eva.
atk-s0506a:2486_22: Imassa ca atthassa idameva vimānaṃ sādhakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2486_23: Sādhāraṇabhāvena yathāvuttadhammassa paccakkhaṃ katvā dassento puna “ima”nti āha.
atk-s0506a:2487_4: Accantameva kilesāsucito visujjhanena sucīsu “sotāpanno sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno”tiādinā vuttesu catūsu purisayugesu.
atk-s0506a:2487_5: Aṭṭhāti maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhesu yugaḷe akatvā visuṃ visuṃ gahaṇena aṭṭha puggalā.
atk-s0506a:2487_6: Gāthāsukhatthameva cettha “puggala dhammadasā”ti rassaṃ katvā niddeso.
atk-s0506a:2487_7: Dhammadasāti catusaccadhammassa nibbānadhammassa ca paccakkhato dassanakā.
atk-s0506a:2488_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā tīhi gāthāhi saraṇaguṇasandassanena saddhiṃ saraṇagamanavidhimhi vutte māṇavo taṃtaṃsaraṇaguṇānussaraṇamukhena
atk-s0506a:2488_1: saraṇagamanavidhino attano hadaye ṭhapitabhāvaṃ vibhāvento tassā tassā gāthāya anantaraṃ “yo vadataṃ
atk-s0506a:2488_3: Evaṃ paccanubhāsitvā ṭhitassa pañca sikkhāpadāni sarūpato phalānisaṃsato ca vibhāvetvā tesaṃ samādānavidhiṃ kathesi.
atk-s0506a:2488_4: So tampi suṭṭhu upadhāretvā pasannamānaso “handāhaṃ bhagavā gamissāmī”ti vatvā ratanattayaguṇaṃ anussaranto taṃyeva maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0506a:2488_5: Bhagavāpi “alaṃ imassa ettakaṃ kusalaṃ devalokūpapattiyā”ti jetavanameva agamāsi.
atk-s0506a:2489_0: Māṇavassa pana pasannacittassa ratanattayaguṇaṃ sallakkhaṇavasena “saraṇaṃ upemī”ti pavattacittuppādatāya saraṇesu ca,
atk-s0506a:2489_1: bhagavatā vuttanayena pañcannaṃ sīlānaṃ adhiṭṭhānena sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitassa teneva nayena ratanattayaguṇe
atk-s0506a:2489_3: So te agaṇetvā ratanattayaguṇe anussarantoyeva gacchati.
atk-s0506a:2489_4: Tañceko coro gumbantaraṃ upanissāya ṭhito visapītena sarena sahasāva vijjhitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā
atk-s0506a:2489_5: kahāpaṇabhaṇḍikaṃ gahetvā attano sahāyehi saddhiṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0506a:2489_6: Māṇavo pana kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane tiṃsayojanike kanakavimāne suttappabuddho viya accharāsahassaparivuto
atk-s0506a:2489_8: tassa vimānassa ābhā sātirekāni vīsatiyojanāni pharitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0506a:2490_0: Atha māṇavaṃ kālakataṃ disvā setabyagāmavāsino manussā setabyaṃ gantvā tassa mātāpitūnaṃ ukkaṭṭhagāmavāsino
atk-s0506a:2490_1: ca ukkaṭṭhaṃ gantvā brāhmaṇassa pokkharasātissa kathesuṃ.
atk-s0506a:2490_2: Taṃ sutvā tassa mātāpitaro ñātimittā brāhmaṇo ca pokkharasāti saparivārā assumukhā rodamānā taṃ padesaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0506a:2490_3: yebhuyyena setabyavāsino ca ukkaṭṭhavāsino ca icchānaṅgalavāsino ca sannipatiṃsu,
atk-s0506a:2490_5: Atha māṇavassa mātāpitaro maggassa avidūre citakaṃ sajjetvā sarīrakiccaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0506a:2491_0: Atha bhagavā cintesi “mayi gate chattamāṇavo maṃ vandituṃ āgamissati,
atk-s0506a:2491_1: āgatañca taṃ katakammaṃ kathāpento kammaphalaṃ paccakkhaṃ kāretvā dhammaṃ desessāmi,
atk-s0506a:2491_2: evaṃ mahājanassa dhammābhisamayo bhavissatī”ti cintetvā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ taṃ padesaṃ upagantvā
atk-s0506a:2491_5: tassā kāraṇaṃ upadhārento saraṇagamanañca sīlasamādānañca disvā,
atk-s0506a:2491_6: vimhayajāto bhagavati sañjātapasādabahumāno “idānevāhaṃ gantvā bhagavantañca bhikkhusaṅghañca vandissāmi,
atk-s0506a:2491_7: ratanattayaguṇe ca mahājanassa pākaṭe karissāmī”ti kataññutaṃ nissāya sakalaṃ taṃ araññapadesaṃ ekālokaṃ karonto,
atk-s0506a:2491_8: saha vimānena āgantvā vimānato oruyha mahatā parivārena saddhiṃ dissamānarūpo upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato
atk-s0506a:2491_9: pādesu sirasā nipatanto abhivādetvā añjaliṃ paggayha ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:2491_10: Taṃ disvā mahājano “ko nu kho ayaṃ devo vā brahmā vā”ti acchariyabbhutajāto upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ parivāresi.
atk-s0506a:2493_0: “Na tathā tapati nabhe sūriyo, cando ca na bhāsati na phusso;
atk-s0506a:2494_0: Yathā atulamidaṃ mahappabhāsaṃ, ko nu tvaṃ tidivā mahiṃ upāgā.
atk-s0506a:2497_0: Rattimapi yathā divaṃ karoti, parisuddhaṃ vimalaṃ subhaṃ vimānaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2509_0: Yathā ca te adhigatamidaṃ vimānaṃ, tadanupadaṃ avacāsi iggha puṭṭho”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2511_7: yathā idaṃ tava vimānaṃ anupamaṃ appamāṇaṃ pabhassarabhāvena tato eva mahappabhāsaṃ ākāse dippati,
atk-s0506a:2511_8: na tathā tārakarūpāni dippanti, na cando,
atk-s0506a:2511_11: evaṃbhūto ko nu tvaṃ devalokato imaṃ bhūmipadesaṃ upagato,
atk-s0506a:2511_12: taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā imassa mahājanassa kathehīti.
atk-s0506a:2512_5: Tassa ca vimānassa pabhā samantato pañcavīsati yojanāni pharitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0506a:2512_7: Rattimapi yathā divaṃ karotīti attano pabhāya andhakāraṃ vidhamantaṃ rattibhāgampi divasabhāgaṃ viya karoti.
atk-s0506a:2512_8: Parisamantato anto ceva bahi ca suddhatāya parisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2513_4: Vokiṇṇaṃ kusumehīti aññehi ca nānāvidhehi pupphehi samokiṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2513_6: Arajavirajahemajālachannanti sayaṃ apagatarajaṃ virajena niddosena kañcanajālena chāditaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2514_2: Ekā hi rattaṃ dibbavatthaṃ nivāsetvā pītaṃ uttariyaṃ karoti,
atk-s0506a:2514_3: aparā pītaṃ nivāsetvā rattaṃ uttariyaṃ karoti.
atk-s0506a:2514_5: Agarupiyaṅgucandanussadāhīti agarugandhena piyaṅgumālāhi candanagandhehi ca ussadāhi,
atk-s0506a:2514_8: Paripūranti tahaṃ tahaṃ vicarantīhi saṅgītipasutāhi ca paripuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2515_6: Anilapamuñcitā pavanti surabhinti anilena pamuñcitagandhānaṃ pupphānaṃ vāyunā vimuttapattapuṭaṃ viya vibandhatāya vikasitatāya ca sugandhaṃ pavāyanti.
atk-s0506a:2515_11: Naranāriyoti devaputtā devadhītaro ca bahukā ettha tava vimāneti dasseti.
atk-s0506a:2516_1: Iṅghāti codanatthe nipāto puṭṭhoti pucchito imassa mahājanassa kammaphalapaccakkhabhāvāyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0506a:2520_0: Tava ratanavarassa dhammaṃ sutvā, karissāmīti ca bravittha chatto.
atk-s0506a:2523_0: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2526_0: Na hi pāṇesu asaññataṃ avaṇṇayiṃsu sappaññā;
atk-s0506a:2527_0: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2530_0: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2532_0: “Mā ca parajanassa rakkhitāyo, parabhariyā agamā anariyametaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2533_0: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2535_0: “Mā ca vitathaṃ aññathā abhāṇi, na hi musāvādaṃ avaṇṇayiṃsu sappaññā;
atk-s0506a:2536_0: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2538_0: “Yena ca purisassa apeti saññā, taṃ majjaṃ parivajjayassu sabbaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2539_0: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2541_0: “Svāhaṃ idha pañca sikkhā karitvā, paṭipajjitvā tathāgatassa dhamme;
atk-s0506a:2542_0: Dvepathamagamāsiṃ coramajjhe, te maṃ tattha vadhiṃsu bhogahetu.
atk-s0506a:2544_0: “Ettakamidaṃ anussarāmi kusalaṃ, tato paraṃ na me vijjati aññaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2545_0: Tena sucaritena kammunāhaṃ, uppanno tidivesu kāmakāmī.
atk-s0506a:2548_0: Jalamiva yasasā samekkhamānā, bahukāmaṃ pihayanti hīnakammā.
atk-s0506a:2550_0: “Passa katipayāya desanāya, sugatiñcamhi gato sukhañca patto;
atk-s0506a:2551_0: Ye ca te satataṃ suṇanti dhammaṃ, maññe te amataṃ phusanti khemaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2553_0: “Appampi kataṃ mahāvipākaṃ, vipulaṃ hoti tathāgatassa dhamme;
atk-s0506a:2554_0: Passa katapuññatāya chatto, obhāseti pathaviṃ yathāpi sūriyo.
atk-s0506a:2556_0: “Kimidaṃ kusalaṃ kimācarema, icceke hi samecca mantayanti;
atk-s0506a:2557_0: Te mayaṃ punareva laddha mānusattaṃ, paṭipannā viharemu sīlavanto.
atk-s0506a:2559_0: “Bahukāro anukampako ca satthā, iti me sati agamā divā divassa;
atk-s0506a:2560_0: Svāhaṃ upagatomhi saccanāmaṃ, anukampassu punapi suṇemha dhammaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2562_0: “Ye cidha pajahanti kāmarāgaṃ, bhavarāgānusayañca pahāya mohaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2563_0: Na ca te puna mupenti gabbhaseyyaṃ, parinibbānagatā hi sītibhūtā”ti.
atk-s0506a:2564_1: Tattha sayamidha pathe samecca māṇavenāti idha imasmiṃ pathe mahāmagge sayameva upagatena māṇavena brāhmaṇakumārena samecca samāgantvā.
atk-s0506a:2564_3: tvaṃ yaṃ māṇavaṃ yathādhammaṃ anusāsi anukampamāno anuggaṇhanto,
atk-s0506a:2564_5: taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā iti evaṃ karissāmi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjissāmīti,
atk-s0506a:2564_6: so chatto chattanāmako māṇavo bravittha kathesīti padayojanā.
atk-s0506a:2565_1: Evaṃ yathāpucchitaṃ kammaṃ kāraṇato dassetvā idāni taṃ sarūpato vibhāgato ca dassento satthārā samādapitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0506a:2565_2: attanā ca tattha pacchā patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “jinavarapavara”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0506a:2565_3: Tattha noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhanteti bhante bhagavā “saraṇagamanaṃ jānāsī”ti tayā vutto “no”ti na “jānāmī”ti paṭhamaṃ avocaṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2565_4: Pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsinti pacchā tayā vuttaṃ kathaṃ parivattento tava vacanaṃ tatheva akāsiṃ paṭipajjiṃ,
atk-s0506a:2566_6: Na hi avaṇṇayiṃsūti na hi vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0506a:2566_8: Atha vā “avaṇṇayiṃsū”ti ekadesena sakalassa kālassa upalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2567_7: vitathasaññī evaṃ vitathanti jānanto evaṃ mā bhaṇīti attho.
atk-s0506a:2570_1: Tatoti yathāvuttakusalato paraṃ upari aññaṃ kusalaṃ na vijjati na upalabbhati,
atk-s0506a:2571_2: Anudhammappaṭipattiyāti yathādhigatassa phalassa anurūpadhammaṃ paṭipajjamānassa bhagavā passa,
atk-s0506a:2571_3: tuyhaṃ ovādadhammassa vā anurūpāya dhammapaṭipattiyā vuttaniyāmeneva saraṇagamanassa sīlasamādānassa cāti attho.
atk-s0506a:2571_4: Jalamiva yasasāti iddhiyā parivārasampattiyā ca jalantaṃ viya.
atk-s0506a:2571_7: Pihayantīti “kathaṃ nu kho mayaṃ edisā bhaveyyāmā”ti patthenti.
atk-s0506a:2572_2: Yeti ye bhikkhū ceva upāsakādayo ca. Ca-
atk-s0506a:2573_2: Tathāgatassa dhammeti tathāgatassa sāsane ovāde ṭhatvā katanti yojanā.
atk-s0506a:2573_5: attānameva vā aññaṃ viya ca katvā vadati.
atk-s0506a:2574_1: Kimidaṃ kusalaṃ kimācaremāti kusalaṃ nāmetaṃ kiṃsabhāvaṃ kīdisaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2574_3: Icceke hi samecca mantayantīti evameke samecca samāgantvā pathaviṃ parivattentā viya sineruṃ ukkhipantā
atk-s0506a:2574_4: viya ca sudukkaraṃ katvā mantayanti vicārenti,
atk-s0506a:2574_5: mayaṃ pana akiccheneva punapi kusalaṃ ācareyyāmāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0506a:2576_0: Evaṃ devaputto sabbametaṃ kataññutābhāve ṭhatvā satthu payirupāsane ca dhammassavane ca atittimeva dīpento vadati.
atk-s0506a:2576_1: Bhagavā devaputtassa ca tattha sannipatitaparisāya ca ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā anupubbikathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0506a:2576_2: Atha nesaṃ allacittataṃ ñatvā sāmukkaṃsikaṃ dhammadesanaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0506a:2576_3: Desanāpariyosāne devaputto ceva mātāpitaro cassa sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0506a:2577_1: Paṭhamaphale patiṭṭhito devaputto uparimaggesu attano garucittīkāraṃ,
atk-s0506a:2577_2: tadadhigamassa ca mahānisaṃsataṃ vibhāvento “ye cidha pajahanti kāmarāga”nti pariyosānagāthamāha.
atk-s0506a:2577_4: ye idha imasmiṃ sāsane ṭhitā pajahanti anavasesato samucchindanti kāmarāgaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2577_5: na ca te puna upenti gabbhaseyyaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ samucchinnattā.
atk-s0506a:2577_6: Ye ca pana pahāya mohaṃ sabbaso samugghātetvā bhavarāgānusayañca pajahanti,
atk-s0506a:2577_7: te puna upenti gabbhaseyyanti vattabbameva natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0506a:2577_9: te hi uttamapurisā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānaṃ gatā evaṃ idheva sabbavedayitānaṃ sabbapariḷāhānaṃ byantibhāvena sītibhūtā.
atk-s0506a:2578_0: Iti devaputto attano ariyasotasamāpannabhāvaṃ pavedento anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā desanāya kūṭaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0506a:2578_1: bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghassa apacitiṃ dassetvā mātāpitaro āpucchitvā devalokameva gato,
atk-s0506a:2578_3: Māṇavassa pana mātāpitaro brāhmaṇo pokkharasāti sabbo ca mahājano bhagavantaṃ anugantvā nivatti.
atk-s0506a:2578_4: Bhagavā jetavanaṃ gantvā sannipatitāya parisāya imaṃ vimānaṃ vitthārato kathesi.
atk-s0506a:2581_3: Tena samayena aññataro bhikkhu āraddhavipassako kaṇṇasūlena pīḷito akallasarīratāya vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0506a:2581_4: vejjehi vuttavidhinā bhesajje katepi rogo na vūpasami.
atk-s0506a:2581_6: Athassa bhagavā “kakkaṭakarasabhojanaṃ sappāya”nti ñatvā āha “gaccha tvaṃ bhikkhu magadhakhette piṇḍāya carāhī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2582_0: So bhikkhu “dīghadassinā addhā kiñci diṭṭhaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā “sādhu bhante”ti bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā
atk-s0506a:2582_1: bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pattacīvaramādāya magadhakhettaṃ gantvā aññatarassa khettapālassa kuṭiyā dvāre piṇḍāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:2582_2: So ca khettapālo kakkaṭakarasaṃ sampādetvā bhattañca pacitvā “thokaṃ vissamitvā bhuñjissāmī”ti nisinno
atk-s0506a:2582_3: theraṃ disvā pattaṃ gahetvā kuṭikāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā kakkaṭakarasabhattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0506a:2582_4: Therassa taṃ bhattaṃ thokaṃ bhuttassayeva kaṇṇasūlaṃ paṭippassambhi,
atk-s0506a:2582_6: So sappāyāhāravasena cittaphāsukaṃ labhitvā vipassanāvasena cittaṃ abhininnāmento apariyositeyeva bhojane
atk-s0506a:2582_7: anavasesato āsave khepetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāya khettapālaṃ āha “upāsaka,
atk-s0506a:2582_10: tvampi imassa puññassa phalena vigatakāyacittadukkho bhavissasī”ti vatvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0506a:2583_0: Khettapālo aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike maṇithambhe kanakavimāne sattasatakūṭāgārapaṭimaṇḍite
atk-s0506a:2583_2: dvāre cassa yathūpacitakammasaṃsūcako muttāsikkāgato suvaṇṇakakkaṭako olambamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:2583_3: Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno pubbe vuttanayena tattha gato taṃ disvā imāhi gāthāhi pucchi –
atk-s0506a:2586_0: Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā.
atk-s0506a:2588_0: “Tatthacchasi pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ;
atk-s0506a:2589_0: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā.
atk-s0506a:2591_0: “Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati;
atk-s0506a:2592_0: Uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0506a:2594_0: “Pucchāmi taṃ deva mahānubhāva, manussabhūto kimakāsi puññaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2595_0: Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2599_0: Pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phala”nti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2604_0: “Tena metādiso vaṇṇo, tena me idha mijjhati;
atk-s0506a:2605_0: Uppajjanti ca me bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0506a:2607_0: “Akkhāmi te bhikkhu mahānubhāva, manussabhūto yamakāsi puññaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2608_0: Tenamhi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2609_4: Rucakatthatāti tassaṃ tassaṃ bhūmiyaṃ suvaṇṇaphalakehi atthatā.
atk-s0506a:2610_1: Pivasi khādasi cāti kālena kālaṃ upayujjamānaṃ gandhapānaṃ sudhābhojanañca sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0506a:2610_3: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañcāti dibbā rasā anappakā pañca kāmaguṇā ettha etasmiṃ tava vimāne saṃvijjantīti attho.
atk-s0506a:2611_2: yena puññakammena ayaṃ dibbasampatti mayā laddhā,
atk-s0506a:2611_4: “kakkaṭakarasadānena ayaṃ tayā sampatti laddhā”ti evaṃ satuppādaṃ karontoti attho.
atk-s0506a:2611_6: Ekamekasmiṃ passe pañca pañca katvā dasa pādā etassāti dasapādako dvāre kakkaṭako ṭhito sobhati.
atk-s0506a:2611_7: So eva mama puññakammaṃ tādisānaṃ mahesīnaṃ vibhāveti,
atk-s0506a:2611_8: na ettha mayā vattabbaṃ atthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0506a:2614_3: Tena ca samayena rājagahe aññataro upāsako cattāri niccabhattāni saṅghassa deti.
atk-s0506a:2614_4: Tassa pana gehaṃ pariyante ṭhitaṃ corabhayena yebhuyyena pihitadvārameva hoti.
atk-s0506a:2614_5: Bhikkhū gantvā kadāci dvārassa pihitattā bhattaṃ aladdhāva paṭigacchanti.
atk-s0506a:2614_11: Taṃ sutvā upāsako saṃvegappatto hutvā ekaṃ purisaṃ dvārapālaṃ katvā ṭhapesi “tvaṃ ajjato paṭṭhāya dvāraṃ rakkhanto nisīda,
atk-s0506a:2614_13: tadā te pavesetvā paviṭṭhānaṃ nesaṃ pattapaṭiggahaṇaāsanapaññāpanādi sabbaṃ yuttapayuttaṃ jānāhī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2614_14: So “sādhū”ti tathā karonto bhikkhūnaṃ santike dhammaṃ sutvā uppannasaddho kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhahi,
atk-s0506a:2615_0: Aparabhāge niccabhattadāyako upāsako kālaṃ katvā yāmesu nibbatti.
atk-s0506a:2615_1: Dvārapālo pana sakkaccaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā parassa pariccāge veyyāvaccakaraṇena anumodanena ca tāvatiṃsesu uppajji.
atk-s0506a:2615_2: Tassa dvādasayojanikaṃ kanakavimānantiādi sabbaṃ kakkaṭakavimāne vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2618_0: Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā.

atk-s0506a:2626_0: Ettāvatā ṭhassati puññakammo, dibbehi kāmehi samaṅgibhūto.
atk-s0506a:2630_1: Tattha dibbaṃ mamaṃ vassasahassamāyūti yasmiṃ devanikāye sayaṃ uppanno,
atk-s0506a:2630_3: Tesañhi manussānaṃ gaṇanāya vassasataṃ eko rattidivo,
atk-s0506a:2630_7: taṃ manussānaṃ gaṇanāya tisso vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassāni honti.
atk-s0506a:2630_13: kiṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ phāsuka”ntiādinā paṭisanthāravasena ca vācāya kathitamattaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2630_14: Manasā pavattitanti “ime ayyā pesalā brahmacārino dhammacārino”tiādinā cittena pavattitaṃ pasādamattaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2630_15: na pana mama santakaṃ kiñci pariccattaṃ atthīti dasseti.
atk-s0506a:2630_17: Ṭhassati puññakammoti katapuñño nāma hutvā devaloke ṭhassati ciraṃ pavattissati,
atk-s0506a:2630_18: tiṭṭhanto ca dibbehi kāmehi samaṅgībhūto tasmiṃ devanikāye devānaṃ valañjaniyāmeneva dibbehi pañcahi
atk-s0506a:2630_19: kāmaguṇehi samaṅgībhūto samannāgato hutvā indriyāni paricārento viharatīti attho.
atk-s0506a:2633_3: Tena samayena sāvatthivāsī eko upāsako nhānopakaraṇāni gahetvā aciravatiṃ gantvā nhatvā āgacchanto bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0506a:2633_4: sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā evamāha “bhante kena nimantitā”ti.
atk-s0506a:2633_6: So kenaci animantitabhāvaṃ ñatvā āha “adhivāsetu me, bhante,
atk-s0506a:2633_9: So bhagavantaṃ attano gehaṃ netvā buddhārahaṃ āsanaṃ paññāpetvā tattha bhagavantaṃ nisīdāpetvā paṇītena annapānena santappesi.
atk-s0506a:2633_10: Bhagavā katabhattakicco tassa anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.

atk-s0506a:2667_3: Tena samayena āyasmato sāriputtassa cīvarakammaṃ kātabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0506a:2667_5: So rājagahe piṇḍāya caranto kammārassa gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:2667_6: Taṃ disvā kammāro āha “kena, bhante, attho”ti?
atk-s0506a:2667_9: Kammāro pasannamānaso katapariyositā dve sūciyo datvā “punapi, bhante,
atk-s0506a:2667_10: sūciyā atthe sati mama ācikkheyyāthā”ti vatvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi.
atk-s0506a:2667_12: So aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu uppajji.
atk-s0506a:2667_13: Atha āyasmā mahāmoggallāno devacārikaṃ caranto taṃ devaputtaṃ imāhi gāthāhi pucchi –
atk-s0506a:2673_0: “Yaṃ dadāti na taṃ hoti, yañceva dajjā tañceva seyyo;
atk-s0506a:2678_1: Tattha yaṃ dadātīti yādisaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dadāti.
atk-s0506a:2678_2: Na taṃ hotīti tassa tādisameva phalaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0506a:2678_3: Atha kho khettasampattiyā ca cittasampattiyā ca tato vipulataraṃ uḷāratarameva phalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0506a:2678_4: Tasmā yañceva dajjā tañceva seyyoti yaṃkiñcideva vijjamānaṃ dajjā dadeyya,
atk-s0506a:2678_6: yassa kassaci anavajjassa deyyadhammassa dānameva seyyo, kasmā?
atk-s0506a:2678_7: Mayā hi sūci dinnā sūcimeva seyyo,
atk-s0506a:2681_3: Tena samayena rājagahavāsī eko tunnakārako vihārapekkhako hutvā veḷuvanaṃ gato.
atk-s0506a:2681_4: Tattha aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ veḷuvane katasūciyā cīvaraṃ sibbantaṃ disvā sūcigharena saddhiṃ sūciyo adāsi.
atk-s0506a:2684_0: Vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti. – pucchi;
atk-s0506a:2691_0: Tassa adāsahaṃ sūciṃ, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi.
atk-s0506a:2693_0: “Tena metādiso vaṇṇo…pe… vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2697_3: Tena samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva devacārikaṃ caranto tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ upagato.
atk-s0506a:2697_4: Tattha addasa aññataraṃ devaputtaṃ sabbasetaṃ mahantaṃ dibbanāgaṃ abhiruyha mahantena parivārena mahatā dibbānubhāvena ākāsena gacchantaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2697_5: sabbā disā cando viya sūriyo viya ca obhāsayamānaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2697_7: Atha so devaputto tato oruyha āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ abhivādetvā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:2699_0: “Susukkakhandhaṃ abhiruyha nāgaṃ, akācinaṃ dantiṃ baliṃ mahājavaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2700_0: Abhiruyha gajavaraṃ sukappitaṃ, idhāgamā vehāyasaṃ antalikkhe.
atk-s0506a:2702_0: “Nāgassa dantesu duvesu nimmitā, acchodakā paduminiyo suphullā;
atk-s0506a:2703_0: Padumesu ca tūriyagaṇā pavajjare, imā ca naccanti manoharāyo.
atk-s0506a:2706_0: Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2708_6: vāladhīti ettakaṃ muñcitvā sabbo kāyo setova,
atk-s0506a:2709_0: Evaṃ pana therena puṭṭho devaputto attanā katakammaṃ kathento –
atk-s0506a:2715_0: Vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti. – imāhi gāthāhi byākāsi;
atk-s0506a:2716_1: ahaṃ pubbe kassapasammāsambuddhassa yojanike kanakathūpe vaṇṭato muccitvā gacchamūle patitāni aṭṭha muttapupphāni
atk-s0506a:2716_2: labhitvā tāni gahetvā pūjanavasena pasannacitto hutvā abhiropesiṃ pūjesiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2717_0: Atīte kira kassapasammāsambuddhe parinibbute yojanike kanakathūpe ca kārite saparivāro kikī kāsirājā

atk-s0506a:2883_0: Amajjapo no ca musā bhaṇāmi, sakena dārena ca homi tuṭṭho”ti.
atk-s0506a:2884_0: Evaṃ pana taṃ saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitaṃ thero evamāha “rājakumāra,
atk-s0506a:2884_4: tasmā tava pitu santikameva gantvā dānādīni puññāni katvā saggaparāyaṇo bhaveyyāsī”ti vatvā attano santike dhātuyo datvā vissajjesi.
atk-s0506a:2884_7: tumhehipi mayhaṃ anukampāya tattha āgantabba”nti vatvā therassa adhivāsanaṃ viditvā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0506a:2884_8: katvā pitu nagaraṃ gantvā uyyānaṃ pavisitvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ rañño nivedesi.
atk-s0506a:2885_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā saparivāro uyyānaṃ gantvā kumāraṃ āliṅgitvā antepuraṃ netvā abhisiñcitukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0506a:2885_3: ito catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena maraṇaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0506a:2885_5: tumhe nissāya puññameva karissāmī”ti vatvā therassa guṇaṃ ratanattayassa ca ānubhāvaṃ pavedesi.
atk-s0506a:2885_6: Taṃ sutvā rājā saṃvegappatto ratanattaye ca there ca pasannamānaso mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā mahākaccāyanattherassa santike dūtaṃ pāhesi.
atk-s0506a:2885_8: Rājā ca saparivāro dūratova paccuggamanaṃ katvā theraṃ vihāraṃ pavesetvā catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahanto saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0506a:2885_9: Kumāro ca sīlāni samādiyitvā theraṃ bhikkhū ceva sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahanto dānāni dadanto dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0506a:2885_10: catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0506a:2885_11: Tassa puññānubhāvena sattaratanapaṭimaṇḍito sattayojanappamāṇo ratho uppajji,
atk-s0506a:2886_0: Rājā kumārassa sarīrasakkāraṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahādānaṃ pavattetvā cetiyassa pūjaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0506a:2886_3: Atha devaputto attanā katakusalakammaṃ oloketvā kataññutāya “gantvā theraṃ vandissāmi,
atk-s0506a:2886_4: sāsanaguṇe ca pākaṭe karissāmī”ti cintetvā dibbarathaṃ āruyha mahatā parivārena dissamānarūpo āgantvā
atk-s0506a:2886_5: rathā oruyha therassa pāde vanditvā pitarā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā theraṃ payirupāsamāno añjaliṃ
atk-s0506a:2888_0: “Sahassaraṃsīva yathāmahappabho, disaṃ yathā bhāti nabhe anukkamaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2892_0: Lekhā suvaṇṇassa ca rūpiyassa ca, sobhenti veḷuriyamayā sunimmitā.
atk-s0506a:2895_0: Yuttā suvaṇṇassa ca rūpiyassa ca, sobhanti assā ca ime manojavā.
atk-s0506a:2898_0: Pucchāmi tāhaṃ yasavanta kovidaṃ, kathaṃ tayā laddho ayaṃ uḷāro”ti.
atk-s0506a:2899_4: Yathā hi mahattena sūriyamaṇḍalena sadisaṃ jotimaṇḍalaṃ natthi,
atk-s0506a:2899_6: Tathā hi taṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe tīsu mahādīpesu ālokaṃ pharantaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0506a:2899_7: Disaṃ yathā bhāti nabhe anukkamanti nabhe ākāse yatheva disaṃ anukkamanto gacchanto yathā yena pakārena bhāti dibbati jotati.
atk-s0506a:2900_6: Tāsaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭesu ca rajatapaṭṭesu ca dissamānattā vuttaṃ “suvaṇṇassa ca rūpiyassa cā”ti.
atk-s0506a:2901_7: atha vā yottā suvaṇṇassa ca rūpiyassa cāti suvaṇṇamayā ca rūpiyamayā ca yottā,
atk-s0506a:2902_1: Adhiṭṭhitoti attano deviddhiyā sakalamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0506a:2902_8: Ayaṃ uḷāroti ayaṃ uḷāro mahanto yasoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0506a:2903_0: Evaṃ therena puṭṭho devaputto imāhi gāthāhi byākāsi –
atk-s0506a:2909_0: Imaṃ sujāta pūjehi, taṃ te atthāya hehiti.
atk-s0506a:2917_0: Evaṃ devaputto therena pucchitamatthaṃ kathetvā theraṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pitaraṃ āpucchitvā rathaṃ āruyha devalokameva gato.
atk-s0506a:2917_1: Theropi tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya vitthārena dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0506a:2917_3: Atha thero taṃ sabbaṃ attanā ca tena ca kathitaniyāmeneva saṅgītikāle dhammasaṅgāhakānaṃ ārocesi,
atk-s0506a:2917_4: te ca taṃ tathā saṅgahaṃ āropesunti.
atk-s0506a:2920_3: Tena ca samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayena devacārikaṃ caranto tāvatiṃsabhavane gopālassa
atk-s0506a:2920_4: nāma devaputtassa attano vimānato nikkhamitvā sahassayuttaṃ mahantaṃ dibbarathaṃ abhiruyha mahantena
atk-s0506a:2920_5: parivārena mahatiyā deviddhiyā uyyānakīḷanatthaṃ gacchantassa avidūre pāturahosi.
atk-s0506a:2920_6: Taṃ disvā devaputto sañjātagāravabahumāno sahasā rathato oruyha upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā añjaliṃ sirasi paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:2921_1: so kira vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ suvaṇṇamālāya pūjetvā “imassa puññassa ānubhāvena mayhaṃ bhave bhave sovaṇṇamayā
atk-s0506a:2921_2: uracchadamālā nibbattatū”ti katapaṇidhānāya anekakappesu sugatīsuyeva saṃsarantiyā kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0506a:2921_3: kāle kikissa kāsirañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattāya yathāpaṇidhānaṃ suvaṇṇamālālābhena “uracchadamālā”ti
atk-s0506a:2921_4: laddhanāmāya devakaññāsadisāya rājadhītāya ācariyo gopālo nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā sasāvakasaṅghassa kassapassa
atk-s0506a:2921_5: bhagavato asadisadānādīni mahādānāni pavattetvā indriyānaṃ aparipakkabhāvena attānaṃ rājadhītarañca uddissa
atk-s0506a:2921_6: satthārā desitaṃ dhammaṃ sutvāpi visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto puthujjanakālakiriyameva katvā yathūpacitapuññānubhāvena
atk-s0506a:2921_9: sattaratanamayo cassa sahassayutto suvibhattabhittivicitto siniddhamadhuranigghoso attano pabhāsamudayena
atk-s0506a:2921_10: avahasanto viya divaṅkaramaṇḍalaṃ dibbo ājaññaratho nibbatti.
atk-s0506a:2922_0: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā aparāparaṃ devesuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0506a:2922_1: tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena yathāvuttasampattivibhavo gopālo eva nāma devaputto hutvā tāvatiṃsesuyeva nibbatti.
atk-s0506a:2922_2: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “tena ca samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno…pe…
atk-s0506a:2923_0: Evaṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā ṭhitaṃ taṃ devaputtaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno imāhi gāthāhi pucchi –
atk-s0506a:2926_0: Uyyānabhūmiṃ abhito anukkamaṃ, purindado bhūtapatīva vāsavo.
atk-s0506a:2928_0: “Sovaṇṇamayā te rathakubbarā ubho, phalehi aṃsehi atīva saṅgatā;
atk-s0506a:2932_0: Sunandighoso ca subhassaro ca, virocatī cāmarahatthabāhubhi.
atk-s0506a:2935_0: Imā ca nābhyo satarājicittitā, sateratā vijjurivappabhāsare.
atk-s0506a:2937_0: “Anekacittāvatato ratho ayaṃ, puthū ca nemī ca sahassaraṃsiko;
atk-s0506a:2938_0: Tesaṃ saro suyyati vaggurūpo, pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyamivappavāditaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2940_0: “Sirasmiṃ cittaṃ maṇicandakappitaṃ, sadā visuddhaṃ ruciraṃ pabhassaraṃ;
atk-s0506a:2941_0: Suvaṇṇarājīhi atīva saṅgataṃ, veḷuriyarājīva atīva sobhati.
atk-s0506a:2943_0: “Ime ca vāḷī maṇicandakappitā, ārohakambū sujavā brahūpamā;
atk-s0506a:2944_0: Brahā mahantā balino mahājavā, mano tavaññāya tatheva siṃsare.
atk-s0506a:2946_0: “Ime ca sabbe sahitā catukkamā, mano tavaññāya tatheva siṃsare;
atk-s0506a:2947_0: Samaṃ vahantī mudukā anuddhatā, āmodamānā turagānamuttamā.
atk-s0506a:2949_0: “Dhunanti vagganti patanti cambare, abbhuddhunantā sukate piḷandhane;
atk-s0506a:2950_0: Tesaṃ saro suyyati vaggurūpo, pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyamivappavāditaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2952_0: “Rathassa ghoso apiḷandhanāna ca, khurassa nādo abhihiṃsanāya ca;
atk-s0506a:2953_0: Ghoso suvaggū samitassa suyyati, gandhabbatūriyāni vicitrasaṃvane.
atk-s0506a:2959_0: Kule sujātā sutanū sucimhitā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā.
atk-s0506a:2962_0: Vaṭṭaṅguliyo sumukhā sudassanā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā.
atk-s0506a:2964_0: “Aññā suveṇī susu missakesiyo, samaṃ vibhattāhi pabhassarāhi ca;
atk-s0506a:2965_0: Anubbatā tā tava mānase ratā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā.
atk-s0506a:2968_0: Anubbatā tā tava mānase ratā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā.
atk-s0506a:2971_0: Anubbatā tā tava mānase ratā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā.
atk-s0506a:2973_0: “Kaṇṭhesu te yāni piḷandhanāni, hatthesu pādesu tatheva sīse;
atk-s0506a:2974_0: Obhāsayantī dasa sabbaso disā, abbhuddayaṃ sāradikova bhāṇumā.
atk-s0506a:2976_0: “Vātassa vegena ca sampakampitā, bhujesu mālā apiḷandhanāni ca;
atk-s0506a:2977_0: Muñcanti ghosaṃ ruciraṃ suciṃ subhaṃ, sabbehi viññūhi sutabbarūpaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2979_0: “Uyyānabhūmyā ca duvaddhato ṭhitā, rathā ca nāgā tūriyāni ca saro;
atk-s0506a:2980_0: Tameva devinda pamodayanti, vīṇā yathā pokkharapattabāhubhi.
atk-s0506a:2982_0: “Imāsu vīṇāsu bahūsu vaggūsu, manuññarūpāsu hadayeritaṃ pītiṃ;
atk-s0506a:2983_0: Pavajjamānāsu atīva accharā, bhamanti kaññā padumesu sikkhitā.
atk-s0506a:2985_0: “Yadā ca gītāni ca vāditāni ca, naccāni cimāni samenti ekato;
atk-s0506a:2986_0: Athettha naccanti athettha accharā, obhāsayantī ubhato varitthiyo.
atk-s0506a:2989_0: Imāsu vīṇāsu bahūsu vaggūsu, manuññarūpāsu hadayeritaṃ pītiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2991_0: “Kiṃ tvaṃ pure kammamakāsi attanā, manussabhūto purimāya jātiyā;
atk-s0506a:2992_0: Uposathaṃ kaṃ vā tuvaṃ upāvasi, kaṃ dhammacariyaṃ vatamābhirocayi.
atk-s0506a:2994_0: “Nayīdamappassa katassa kammuno, pubbe suciṇṇassa uposathassa vā;
atk-s0506a:2995_0: Iddhānubhāvo vipulo ayaṃ tava, yaṃ devasaṅghaṃ abhirocase bhusaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2997_0: “Dānassa te idaṃ phalaṃ, atho sīlassa vā pana;
atk-s0506a:2998_0: Atho añjalikammassa, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0506a:2999_2: sahassaṃ vā yuttaṃ yojitaṃ etasminti sahassayuttaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2999_6: Keci pana “sahassayuttahayavāhana”nti anunāsikalopaṃ ekameva samāsapadaṃ katvā vaṇṇenti,
atk-s0506a:2999_7: etasmiṃ pakkhe hayavāhanaṃ viya vāhananti attho yujjati.
atk-s0506a:2999_13: “Abhito”ti hi padaṃ apekkhitvā sāmiatthe etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2999_16: Anukkamanti gacchanto purindado bhūtapatīva vāsavo virocasīti sambandho.
atk-s0506a:3000_3: Rathakubbarā ubhoti rathassa ubhosu passesu vedikā.
atk-s0506a:3000_4: Yo hi rathassa sobhanatthañceva upari ṭhitānaṃ guttatthañca ubhosu passesu vedikākārena parikkhepo karīyati,
atk-s0506a:3000_5: tassa purimabhāge ubhosu passesu yāva rathīsā,
atk-s0506a:3000_13: Atīva saṅgatāti ativiya suṭṭhu saṅgatā suphassitā nibbivarā.
atk-s0506a:3000_14: Idañca sippiviracite kittimarathe labbhamānavisesaṃ tattha āropetvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3000_15: So pana aporisatāya akittimo sayaṃjāto kenaci aghaṭitoyeva.
atk-s0506a:3000_17: Ye hi vedikāya nirantaraṃ ṭhitā susaṇṭhitaghaṭakādiavayavavisesavanto thambhakasamudāyā,
atk-s0506a:3000_20: Sippācariyā hi attano sarīrakhedaṃ acintetvā vīriyabalena sippassa suṭṭhu vicāraṇato naresu vīriyavantoti idha “naravīrā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0506a:3000_25: Evaṃvidhakubbaratāya ayaṃ tava ratho virocati. Kiṃ viya?
atk-s0506a:3001_10: “kālena kālaṃ āsīvādanavasena suṭṭhu payuttanandighoso”ti ca vadanti.
atk-s0506a:3001_12: tattha vā pavattamānānaṃ devatānaṃ sobhanena gītavāditassarena subhassaro.
atk-s0506a:3001_13: Cāmarahatthabāhubhīti cāmarahatthayuttabāhūhi ito cito ca bījayamāna cāmarakalāpehi devatānaṃ bhujehi,
atk-s0506a:3002_3: Rathassa pādantaramajjhabhūsitāti rathassa pādānaṃ rathacakkānaṃ antena neminā nānāratanasamujjalena arānaṃ vemajjhena ca maṇḍitā.
atk-s0506a:3002_4: Satarājicittitāti anekavaṇṇāhi anekasatāhi rājīhi lekhāhi cittitā vicittabhāvaṃ gatā.
atk-s0506a:3002_5: Sateratā vijjurivāti sateratasaṅkhātavijjulatā viya pabhāsare vijjotanti.
atk-s0506a:3003_5: Puthū ca nemī cāti puthulanemi ca, eko ca-
atk-s0506a:3003_10: tattha natāti ajiyadhanudaṇḍako viya oṇatā nemippadesā.
atk-s0506a:3004_6: Ruciraṃ pabhassaranti iminā tassa candamaṇḍalasadisataṃyeva vibhāveti,
atk-s0506a:3004_7: sadā visuddhanti iminā panassa candamaṇḍalatopi visesaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0506a:3004_10: Veḷuriyarājīvāti antarantarā suvaṇṇarājīhi khacitamaṇimaṇḍalattā veḷuriyarājīhi viya sobhati.
atk-s0506a:3005_10: attano pamāṇato adhikā viya paññāyantāti attho.
atk-s0506a:3005_13: Balinoti sarīrabalena ca ussāhabalena ca balavanto.
atk-s0506a:3006_3: Sahitāti samānajavatāya samānagamanatāya ca gatiyaṃ sahitā,
atk-s0506a:3006_6: Samaṃ vahantīti “sahitā”ti padena vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti.
atk-s0506a:3006_12: akhaḷuṅkatāya aññamaññaṃ rathikādīnañca tuṭṭhiṃ pavedayantāti attho.
atk-s0506a:3007_2: Vaggantīti kadāci pade padaṃ nikkhipantā vagganena gamanena gacchanti.
atk-s0506a:3007_7: Abbhuddhunantāti kammasippinā sukate suṭṭhu nimmite khuddakaghaṇṭādiassālaṅkāre abhiuddhunantā adhikaṃ uddhunantā.
atk-s0506a:3008_9: madhurassa pana khuranipātasaddassa upaladdhihetubhūtena kammunā tesaṃ khuranikkhepe khuranikkhepe paṭighāto labbhatīti vadanti.
atk-s0506a:3008_13: Samitassāti samuditassa dibbajanassa ghoso ca suvaggu sumadhuraṃ suyyati.
atk-s0506a:3009_11: Gandhabbasūraggapūjitāti gandhabbadevatāhi ceva aparāhi ca aggadevatāhi laddhapūjā.
atk-s0506a:3010_1: Tā rattarattambarapītavāsasāti rajanīyarūpā ca rattapītavatthā ca.
atk-s0506a:3010_3: Kule sujātāti sindhavakule sujātā visiṭṭhadevanikāye sambhavā.
atk-s0506a:3012_6: samaṃ aññamaññasadisaṃ nānāvibhattivasena vibhattāhi suvaṇṇacīrādikhacitāhi indanīlamaṇiādayo viya pabhassarāhi kesavaṭṭīhi missitakesiyoti yojanā.
atk-s0506a:3014_10: So hi abbhādidosavirahena dasapi disā suṭṭhu obhāseti.
atk-s0506a:3015_1: Vātassa vegena cāti manuññagandhūpahāraṃ saddūpahārañca karontena upaharantena viya vāyantena vātassa vegena rathaturaṅgavegena ca.
atk-s0506a:3015_6: Sabbehi viññūhi sutabbarūpanti sabbehipi viññujātikehi gandhabbasamayaññūhi sotabbaṃ savanīyaṃ uttamasabhāvaṃ ghosaṃ muñcantīti yojanā.
atk-s0506a:3016_10: Vīṇā yathā pokkharapattabāhubhīti yathā vīṇā sammadeva yojitehi doṇipattabāhudaṇḍehi taṃtaṃmucchanānurūpaṃ
atk-s0506a:3016_12: evaṃ taṃ rathādayo attano sarena pamodayanti.
atk-s0506a:3016_13: Susikkhitabhāvena pokkharabhāvaṃ sundarabhāvaṃ pattehi vīṇāvādakassa hatthehi pavāditā vīṇā yathā mahājanaṃ pamodeti,
atk-s0506a:3016_14: evaṃ taṃ rathādayo attano sarena pamodayantīti.
atk-s0506a:3017_2: imāsu ujukoṭivaṅkabrahatīnandinītisaraādibhedāsu bahūsu vīṇāsu siniddhamadhurassaratāya vaggūsu tato
atk-s0506a:3017_3: eva manuññarūpāsu hadayeritaṃ hadayaṅgamaṃ hadayahāriniṃ pītiṃ pītinimittaṃ pavajjamānāsu pavādiyamānāsu
atk-s0506a:3017_4: accharā devakaññā pītivegukkhittatāya attano susikkhitatāya ca dibbapadumesu bhamanti naccaṃ dassentiyo
atk-s0506a:3018_5: Atha vā samenti ekatoti ekato ekajjhaṃ samāni samarasāni karonti,
atk-s0506a:3018_7: gītassarañca tantissarena saṃsandantiyo naccanena yathādhigate hassādirase aparihāpentiyo samenti samānentīti attho.
atk-s0506a:3018_8: Atthettha naccanti athettha accharā obhāsayantīti evaṃ gītādīni samarase karontiyo atha aññā ekaccā accharā ettha etasmiṃ tava rathe naccanti,
atk-s0506a:3018_9: atha aññā varitthiyo uttamitthiyo naccaṃ passantiyo attano sarīrobhāsena ceva vatthābharaṇaobhāsena ca
