atk-s0506a:3658_5: Tattha candaṃ viya dārako rudanti candaṃ abhipatthayaṃ rudanto dārako viyāti attho.
atk-s0506a:3660_0: Atha brāhmaṇo sokaṃ vinodetvā attano upadesadāyakaṃ dibbarūpena ṭhitaṃ disvā “ko nāma tva”nti pucchanto –
atk-s0506a:3663_0: Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya”nti. –
atk-s0506a:3666_0: “Yañca kandasi yañca rodasi, puttaṃ āḷāhane sayaṃ dahitvā;
atk-s0506a:3667_0: Svāhaṃ kusalaṃ karitvā kammaṃ, tidasānaṃ sahabyataṃ gato”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3668_1: Tattha yañca kandasi yañca rodasīti yaṃ tava puttaṃ maṭṭhakuṇḍaliṃ uddissa rodasi,
atk-s0506a:3671_0: “Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā nāddasāma, dānaṃ dadantassa sake agāre;
atk-s0506a:3672_0: Uposathakammaṃ vā tādisaṃ, kena kammena gatosi devaloka”nti.
atk-s0506a:3677_0: Buddhaṃ vigatarajaṃ vitiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ, addakkhiṃ sugataṃ anomapaññaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3680_0: Tāhaṃ kusalaṃ karitvāna kammaṃ, tidasānaṃ sahabyataṃ gato”ti.
atk-s0506a:3682_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ kathenteyeva brāhmaṇassa sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā paripūri. So taṃ pītiṃ pavedento –
atk-s0506a:3688_0: Tattha anabhiṇhappavattitāya accharaṃ paharituṃ yogganti acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3689_0: Atha naṃ devaputto saraṇagamane sīlasamādāne ca niyojento –
atk-s0506a:3691_0: “Ajjeva buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ vajāhi, dhammañca saṅghañca pasannacitto;
atk-s0506a:3692_0: Tatheva sikkhāya padāni pañca, akhaṇḍaphullāni samādiyassu.
atk-s0506a:3695_0: Amajjapo mā ca musā bhaṇāhi, sakena dārena ca hohi tuṭṭho”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3697_1: Tattha tathevāti yathā pasannacitto “sammāsambuddho bhagavā”ti buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ vajesi,
atk-s0506a:3697_3: suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti pasannacitto dhammañca saṅghañca saraṇaṃ vajāhi.
atk-s0506a:3697_4: Yathā vā pasannacitto ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ vajesi,
atk-s0506a:3697_5: tatheva “ayaṃ ekaṃsato diṭṭheva dhamme abhisamparāyañca hitasukhāvaho”ti pasannacitto sikkhāya adhisīlasikkhāya
atk-s0506a:3697_6: padāni koṭṭhāsabhūtāni adhicittaadhipaññāsikkhāya vā upāyabhūtāni pañcasīlāni avikopanato ca asaṃkilissanato
atk-s0506a:3698_0: Evaṃ devaputtena saraṇagamane sīlasamādāne ca niyojito brāhmaṇo tassa vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchanto –
atk-s0506a:3701_0: Karomi tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mamā”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3708_0: Amajjapo no ca musā bhaṇāmi, sakena dārena ca homi tuṭṭho”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3710_1: idāni sayameva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamissatī”ti tattheva antaradhāyi.
atk-s0506a:3710_2: Brāhmaṇopi kho bhagavati sañjātapasādabahumāno devatāya ca codiyamāno “samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamissāmī”ti vihārābhimukho gacchati.
atk-s0506a:3710_3: Taṃ disvā mahājano “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo ettakaṃ kālaṃ tathāgataṃ anupasaṅkamitvā ajja puttasokena upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0506a:3710_4: kīdisī nu kho dhammadesanā bhavissatī”ti taṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0506a:3711_0: Brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā evamāha “sakkā nu kho bho gotama kiñci dānaṃ adatvā
atk-s0506a:3711_1: sīlaṃ vā arakkhitvā kevalaṃ tumhesu pasādamattena sagge nibbattitu”nti. “Nanu, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0506a:3711_2: ajja paccūsavelāyaṃ maṭṭhakuṇḍalinā devaputtena attano devalokūpapattikāraṇaṃ tuyhaṃ kathika”nti bhagavā avoca.
atk-s0506a:3711_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe maṭṭhakuṇḍalīdevaputto saha vimānena āgantvā dissamānarūpo vimānato oruyha bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā añjaliṃ paggayha ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:3711_4: Atha bhagavā tassaṃ parisati tena devaputtena katasucaritaṃ kathetvā parisāya cittakallataṃ ñatvā sāmukkaṃsikaṃ dhammadesanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0506a:3711_5: Desanāpariyosāne devaputto ca brāhmaṇo ca sannipatitaparisā cāti caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0506a:3714_0: Suṇotha yakkhassa ca vāṇijāna cāti serīsakavimānaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3714_2: Bhagavati parinibbute āyasmā kumārakassapo pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ setabyanagaraṃ sampatto.
atk-s0506a:3714_3: Tattha pāyāsirājaññaṃ attano santikaṃ upagataṃ viparītaggāhato vivecetvā sammādassane patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0506a:3714_4: So tato paṭṭhāya puññapasuto hutvā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ dānaṃ dento tattha akataparicayatāya asakkaccaṃ
atk-s0506a:3714_5: dānaṃ datvā aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā cātumahārājikabhavane suññe serīsake vimāne nibbatti.
atk-s0506a:3715_0: Atīte kira kassapassa bhagavato kāle eko khīṇāsavatthero aññatarasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya caritvā bahigāme devasikaṃ ekasmiṃ padese bhattakiccaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0506a:3715_1: Taṃ disvā eko gopālako “ayyo sūriyātapena kilamatī”ti pasannacitto catūhi sirīsathambhehi sākhāmaṇḍapaṃ katvā adāsi,
atk-s0506a:3715_2: maṇḍapassa samīpe sirīsarukkhaṃ ropesīti ca vadanti.
atk-s0506a:3715_3: So kālaṃ katvā teneva puññakammena cātumahārājikesu nibbatti,
atk-s0506a:3715_4: tassa purimakammassa sūcakaṃ vimānadvāre sirīsavanaṃ nibbatti vaṇṇagandhasampannehi pupphehi sabbakālaṃ upasobhamānaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3715_6: So ca devaputto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devesu ceva manussesu ca saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde yasattherassa
atk-s0506a:3715_7: catūsu vimalādīsu gihisahāyesu gavampati nāma hutvā bhagavato dhammadesanāya arahatte patiṭṭhito pubbāciṇṇavasena
atk-s0506a:3715_8: taṃ suññavimānaṃ disvā abhiṇhaṃ divāvihāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0506a:3716_0: So aparabhāge pāyāsidevaputtaṃ tattha disvā “kosi tvaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3716_2: pāyāsirājañño idhūpapanno”ti vutte “nanu tvaṃ micchādiṭṭhiko viparītadassano kathamidhūpapanno”ti āha.
atk-s0506a:3716_3: Atha naṃ pāyāsidevaputto “ayyenamhi kumārakassapattherena micchādassanato vivecito,
atk-s0506a:3716_4: puññakiriyānaṃ asakkaccakāritāya pana suññe vimāne nibbatto. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0506a:3716_5: manussalokaṃ gatakāle mama parijanassa ārocetha ‘pāyāsirājañño asakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā suññaṃ serīsakavimānaṃ upapanno,
atk-s0506a:3716_6: tumhe pana sakkaccaṃ puññāni katvā tatrūpapattiyā cittaṃ paṇidahathā”ti.
atk-s0506a:3716_8: Tepi therassa vacanaṃ sutvā tathā cittaṃ paṇidhāya puññāni katvā serīsake vimāne nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0506a:3716_9: Serīsakadevaputtaṃ pana vessavaṇamahārājā marubhūmiyaṃ chāyūdakarahite magge maggapaṭipannānaṃ manussānaṃ
atk-s0506a:3717_0: Atha aparena samayena aṅgamagadhavāsino vāṇijā sakaṭasahassaṃ bhaṇḍassa pūretvā sindhusovīradesaṃ gacchantā
atk-s0506a:3717_1: marukantāre divā uṇhabhayena maggaṃ appaṭipajjitvā rattiṃ nakkhattasaññāya maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0506a:3717_2: Te maggamūḷhā hutvā aññaṃ disaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0506a:3717_3: Tesaṃ antare eko upāsako ahosi saddho pasanno sīlasampanno arahattappattiyā upanissayasampanno mātāpitūnaṃ upaṭṭhānatthaṃ vaṇijjāya gato.
atk-s0506a:3717_4: Taṃ anuggaṇhanto serīsakadevaputto saha vimānena attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0506a:3717_5: Dassetvā ca pana “kasmā tumhe imaṃ chāyūdakarahitaṃ vālukākantāraṃ paṭipannā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0506a:3717_6: Te cassa tattha attano āgatappakāraṃ kathesuṃ,
atk-s0506a:3717_8: Ādito pana dve gāthā tāsaṃ sambandhadassanatthaṃ dhammasaṅgāhakehi ṭhapitā –
atk-s0506a:3719_0: “Suṇotha yakkhassa ca vāṇijāna ca, samāgamo yattha tadā ahosi;
atk-s0506a:3720_0: Yathā kathaṃ itaritarena cāpi, subhāsitaṃ tañca suṇātha sabbe.
atk-s0506a:3722_0: “Yo so ahu rājā pāyāsi nāma, bhummānaṃ sahabyagato yasassī;
atk-s0506a:3723_0: So modamānova sake vimāne, amānuso mānuse ajjhabhāsī”ti.
atk-s0506a:3724_5: Devo hi manussānaṃ ekaccānaṃ devānañca pūjanīyabhāvato “yakkho”ti vuccati.
atk-s0506a:3724_6: Apica sakkopi cattāro mahārājānopi vessavaṇapārisajjāpi purisopi “yakkho”ti vuccati.
atk-s0506a:3724_7: Tathā hi “atibāḷhaṃ kho ayaṃ yakkho pamatto viharati,
atk-s0506a:3724_8: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ yakkhaṃ saṃvejeyya”ntiādīsu sakko “yakkho”ti vutto.
atk-s0506a:3724_14: Vāṇijāna cāti gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ anunāsikalopaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3724_21: serīsakadevaputtassa vāṇijānañca tadā yattha samāgamo ahosi,
atk-s0506a:3724_23: yathā vāpi tehi aññamaññaṃ subhāsitaṃ sulapitaṃ kathaṃ pavattitaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3728_0: Suduggame vaṇṇupathassa majjhe, vaṅkaṃbhayā naṭṭhamanā manussā.
atk-s0506a:3730_0: “Nayidha phalā mūlamayā ca santi, upādānaṃ natthi kutodha bhakkho;
atk-s0506a:3731_0: Aññatra paṃsūhi ca vālukāhi ca, tattāhi uṇhāhi ca dāruṇāhi ca.
atk-s0506a:3736_0: “Atha tumhe kena vaṇṇena, kimāsamānā imaṃ padesañhi;
atk-s0506a:3737_0: Anupaviṭṭhā sahasā samecca, lobhā bhayā atha vā sampamūḷhā”ti.
atk-s0506a:3738_3: marissāma nu kho”ti jīvite saṃsayo hoti,
atk-s0506a:3738_8: kaṃ tārenti nayanti etthāti hi kantāro,
atk-s0506a:3738_14: Vaṅkehi bhayaṃ etesanti “vaṅkabhayā”ti vattabbe gāthāsukhatthaṃ sānunāsikaṃ katvā “vaṅkaṃbhayā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3738_15: Idañca vālukākantārapavesanato pubbe tesaṃ uppannabhayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3739_5: Upādānaṃ natthīti kiñcāpi kiñci bhakkhaṃ natthi,
atk-s0506a:3739_8: kuto kena kāraṇena idha marukantāre bhakkho siyāti attho.
atk-s0506a:3740_1: Ujjaṅgalanti jaṅgalaṃ vuccati lūkhadhūsaro anudako bhūmippadeso,
atk-s0506a:3740_2: taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ jaṅgalatopi ukkaṃsena jaṅgalanti āha “ujjaṅgala”nti.
atk-s0506a:3740_7: Anāyasanti natthi ettha āyo sukhanti anāyaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3740_8: tato eva jīvitaṃ sīyati vināsetīti anāyasaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3740_11: Narakañhi sattānaṃ ekantānatthatāya parabhūto paṭisattubhūto lokoti visesato “paraloko”ti vuccati,
atk-s0506a:3740_17: Luddānamāvāsamidaṃ purāṇanti idaṃ ṭhānaṃ cirakālato paṭṭhāya luddānaṃ dāruṇānaṃ pisācādīnaṃ āvāsabhūtaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3740_18: Abhisattarūpoti “evaṃ lūkho ghorākāro hotū”ti porāṇehi isīhi sapitasadiso,
atk-s0506a:3741_6: Sahasā sameccāti sahasā ādīnavānisaṃse avicāretvā samavāyena anupaviṭṭhā sappaviṭṭhā.
atk-s0506a:3741_7: Lobhā bhayā atha vā kenaci anatthakāmena palobhitā lobhato kenaci amanussādinā paripātitā bhayā vā.
atk-s0506a:3741_8: Atha vā sampamūḷhāti maggavippanaṭṭhā imaṃ padesaṃ anupaviṭṭhāti yojanā.
atk-s0506a:3744_0: “Magadhesu aṅgesu ca satthavāhā, āropayitvā paṇiyaṃ puthuttaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3745_0: Te yāmase sindhusovīrabhūmiṃ, dhanatthikā uddayaṃ patthayānā.
atk-s0506a:3748_0: Etena vegena āyāma sabbe, rattiṃ maggaṃ paṭipannā vikāle.
atk-s0506a:3751_0: Suduggame vaṇṇupathassa majjhe, disaṃ na jānāma pamūḷhacittā.
atk-s0506a:3754_0: Tatuttariṃ jīvitamāsamānā, disvā patītā sumanā udaggā”ti.
atk-s0506a:3755_1: Tattha magadhesu aṅgesu ca satthavāhāti magadharaṭṭhe ca aṅgaraṭṭhe ca jātā saṃvaḍḍhā taṃnivāsino satthe
atk-s0506a:3755_2: satthassa ca vāhanakā satthakā ceva satthasāmikā ca.
atk-s0506a:3756_4: yena tava dassanato pubbe āyāma āgatamha.
atk-s0506a:3756_5: Rattiṃ maggaṃ paṭipannāti rattiyaṃ maggaṃ paṭipannā.
atk-s0506a:3758_3: Tatuttariṃ jīvitamāsamānāti yo “ito paraṃ amhākaṃ jīvitaṃ natthī”ti jīvitasaṃsayo uppanno,
atk-s0506a:3759_0: Evaṃ vāṇijehi attano pavattiyā pakāsitāya puna devaputto dvīhi gāthāhi pucchi –
atk-s0506a:3761_0: “Pāraṃ samuddassa imañca vaṇṇuṃ, vettācaraṃ saṅkupathañca maggaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3762_0: Nadiyo pana pabbatānañca duggā, puthuddisā gacchatha bhogahetu.
atk-s0506a:3765_0: Yaṃ vo sutaṃ vā atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ, accherakaṃ taṃ vo suṇoma tātā”ti.
atk-s0506a:3766_3: vaṇṇuṃ vaṇṇupathaṃ vettalatā bandhitvā ācaritabbato vettācaraṃ maggaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3766_4: saṅkuke khāṇuke koṭṭetvā gantabbato saṅkupathaṃ maggaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3766_6: pabbatānañca visamappadesāti evaṃ duggā puthuddisā bhoganimittaṃ gacchatha,
atk-s0506a:3766_7: evaṃ gacchantā ca pakkhandiyāna pakkhanditvā anupavisitvā,
atk-s0506a:3766_8: paresaṃ rājūnaṃ vijitaṃ tattha verajjake videsavāsike manusse pekkhamānā gacchatha,
atk-s0506a:3766_9: evaṃbhūtehi vo tumhehi yaṃ sutaṃ vā atha vā diṭṭhaṃ vā accherakaṃ acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3766_10: taṃ vo santike tātā vāṇijā suṇomāti attano vimānassa acchariyabhāvaṃ tehi kathāpetukāmo pucchati.
atk-s0506a:3769_0: “Itopi accherataraṃ kumāra, na no sutaṃ vā atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3770_0: Atītamānusakameva sabbaṃ, disvā na tappāma anomavaṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3773_0: Dumā cime niccaphalūpapannā, atīva gandhā surabhiṃ pavāyanti.
atk-s0506a:3782_0: Daḷho ca vaggu ca susaṅgato ca, atīva nijjhānakhamo manuñño.
atk-s0506a:3788_0: Acintiyo sabbaguṇūpapanno, rājā yathā vessavaṇo naḷinyā.
atk-s0506a:3794_1: Tattha kumārāti paṭhamavaye ṭhitattā devaputtaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0506a:3794_2: Sabbanti devaputtaṃ tassa vimānapaṭibaddhañca sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0506a:3795_6: Tapanīyapaṭṭehi ca sādhuchannanti tapanīyamayehi anekaratanamayehi ca chadanehi tattha tattha suṭṭhu chāditaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3796_1: Jambonaduttattamidanti idaṃ tava vimānaṃ yebhuyyena uttattajambunadabhāsuraṃ.
atk-s0506a:3796_2: Sumaṭṭho pāsādasopānaphalūpapannoti tassa ca so so padeso sumaṭṭho suṭṭhu majjito,
atk-s0506a:3796_3: tehi tehi anantarapāsādehi sopānavisesehi ramaṇīyehi phalakehi ca yutto.
atk-s0506a:3797_3: Bahuannapānanti pesalaṃ pahūtaṃ annañca pānañca vijjati,
atk-s0506a:3797_5: Murajaālambaratūriyaghuṭṭhoti mudiṅgānaṃ ālambarānaṃ avasiṭṭhatūriyānañca saddehi niccaghosito.
atk-s0506a:3798_2: Naḷinyāti evaṃnāmake kīḷanaṭṭhāne yathā vessavaṇo mahārājā,
atk-s0506a:3799_4: Yakkhoti devādibhāvaṃ pucchitvāpi yakkhabhāvaṃ āsaṅkantā vadanti.
atk-s0506a:3802_0: “Serīsako nāma ahamhi yakkho, kantāriyo vaṇṇupathamhi gutto;
atk-s0506a:3803_0: Imaṃ padesaṃ abhipālayāmi, vacanakaro vessavaṇassa rañño”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3804_1: Tattha ahamhī yakkhoti ahaṃ yakkho amhi.
atk-s0506a:3805_0: Idāni vāṇijā tassa kammādīni pucchantā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0506a:3807_0: “Adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃkataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3808_0: Pucchanti taṃ vāṇijā satthavāhā, kathaṃ tayā laddhamidaṃ manuñña”nti.
atk-s0506a:3809_6: Udāhu devehi dinnanti tayā ārādhitehi devehi pasādavasena nissaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3810_0: Idāni devaputto caturopi pakāre paṭikkhipitvā puññameva apadisanto –
atk-s0506a:3812_0: “Nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃkataṃ na hi devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3813_0: Sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ manuñña”nti. –
atk-s0506a:3815_0: Taṃ sutvā vāṇijā puna “nādhiccaladdha”nti gāthāyaṃ puññādhikameva te caturo pakāre āropetvā puññassa ca sarūpaṃ pucchiṃsu –
atk-s0506a:3817_0: “Kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0506a:3818_0: Pucchanti taṃ vāṇijā satthavāhā, kathaṃ tayā laddhamidaṃ vimāna”nti.
atk-s0506a:3820_0: Puna devaputto te paṭikkhipitvā attānaṃ yathūpacitaṃ puññañca dassento –
atk-s0506a:3822_0: “Mamaṃ pāyāsīti ahu samaññā, rajjaṃ yadā kārayiṃ kosalānaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3823_0: Natthikadiṭṭhi kadariyo pāpadhammo, ucchedavādī ca tadā ahosiṃ.
atk-s0506a:3825_0: “Samaṇo ca kho āsi kumārakassapo, bahussuto cittakathī uḷāro;
atk-s0506a:3826_0: So me tadā dhammakathaṃ abhāsi, diṭṭhivisūkāni vinodayī me.
atk-s0506a:3829_0: Pāṇātipātā virato ahosiṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayissaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3830_0: Amajjapo no ca musā abhāṇiṃ, sakena dārena ca ahosiṃ tuṭṭho.
atk-s0506a:3832_0: “Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0506a:3833_0: Teheva kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimāna”nti. –
atk-s0506a:3835_0: Atha vāṇijā devaputtaṃ vimānañcassa paccakkhato disvā kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā attano kammaphale saddhaṃ pavedentā –
atk-s0506a:3837_0: “Saccaṃ kirāhaṃsu narā sapaññā, anaññathā vacanaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3838_0: Yahiṃ yahiṃ gacchati puññakammo, tahiṃ tahiṃ modati kāmakāmī.
atk-s0506a:3840_0: “Yahiṃ yahiṃ sokapariddavo ca, vadho ca bandho ca parikkileso;
atk-s0506a:3841_0: Tahiṃ tahiṃ gacchati pāpakammo, na muccati duggatiyā kadācī”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3842_0: Gāthādvayaṃ avocuṃ. Tattha sokapariddavoti soko ca paridevo ca. Parikkilesoti vuttā anatthuppatti.
atk-s0506a:3843_0: Evaṃ tesu kathentesuyeva vimānadvāre sirīsarukkhato paripākena muttabandhanā paripakkā sipāṭikā pati,
atk-s0506a:3846_0: Janassimassa tuyhañca kumāra, appaccayo kena nu kho ahosī”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3847_1: Tattha sammūḷharūpovāti sokavasena sabbaso mūḷhasabhāvo viya.
atk-s0506a:3847_6: Janassimassa tuyhañcāti imassa tava parijanassa tuyhañca.
atk-s0506a:3850_0: “Ime ca sirīsavanā tātā, dibbā gandhā surabhī sampavanti;
atk-s0506a:3851_0: Te sampavāyanti imaṃ vimānaṃ, divā ca ratto ca tamaṃ nihantvā.
atk-s0506a:3854_0: Mānussakaṃ vassasataṃ atītaṃ, yadagge kāyamhi idhūpapanno.
atk-s0506a:3860_3: Ime tumhākaṃ mayhañca paccakkhabhūtā dibbā gandhā surabhī ativiya sugandhāyeva samantato pavanti pavāyanti.
atk-s0506a:3860_4: Te dibbā gandhā evaṃ vāyantā imaṃ vimānaṃ sampavāyanti sammadeva gandhaṃ gāhāpenti,
atk-s0506a:3860_6: atha kho attano pabhāya tamampi nihanti.
atk-s0506a:3860_7: Tenāha “divā ca ratto ca tamaṃ nihantvā”ti.
atk-s0506a:3861_5: Mānussakaṃ vassasataṃ atītanti yasmā vassasatassa accayena imassa sirīsassa sipāṭikā phalati,
atk-s0506a:3861_9: kāyamhi idha imasmiṃ devanikāye upapanno nibbatto.
atk-s0506a:3861_11: tasmā khīyati me āyūti sokavasena sampamūḷhoti dasseti.
atk-s0506a:3864_0: “Kathaṃ nu soceyya tathāvidho so, laddhā vimānaṃ atulaṃ cirāya;
atk-s0506a:3865_0: Ye cāpi kho ittaramupapannā, te nūna soceyyuṃ parittapuññā”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3866_1: Tattha yādisehi appāyukehi maraṇaṃ paṭicca socitabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0506a:3866_2: tādiso pana evaṃ dibbānubhāvasampanno navutivassasatasahassāyuko kathaṃ nu soceyya,
atk-s0506a:3867_0: Devaputto tattakeneva samassāsetvā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchanto tesañca upadesaṃ dento –
atk-s0506a:3869_0: “Anucchaviṃ ovadiyañca metaṃ, yaṃ maṃ tumhe peyyavācaṃ vadetha;
atk-s0506a:3870_0: Tumhe ca kho tātā mayānuguttā, yehicchakaṃ tena paletha sotthi”nti. –
atk-s0506a:3871_3: Ovadiyañca metanti me mayhaṃ tumhehi ovadiyaṃ ovādavasena vattabbametaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3871_6: tumhe “kathaṃ nu soceyya”ntiādinā peyyavācaṃ piyavacanaṃ vadetha.
atk-s0506a:3871_9: Atha vā yaṃ yasmā tumhe peyyavācaṃ vadetha,
atk-s0506a:3871_10: tasmā anucchavikaṃ ovadiyañca ovaditabbaṃ ovādānurūpaṃ kātabbañca me mayā kataṃ,
atk-s0506a:3871_11: kiṃ pana tanti āha “tumhe ca kho tātā”tiādi.
atk-s0506a:3871_12: Tattha mayānuguttāti imasmiṃ amanussapariggahe marukantāre yāva kantārātikkamā mayā anuguttā rakkhitā,
atk-s0506a:3877_0: Puna devaputto mahakaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipanto kattabbesu ca te niyojento –
atk-s0506a:3879_0: “Mā ceva serīsamahaṃ akattha, sabbañca vo bhavissati yaṃ vadetha;
atk-s0506a:3881_1: Tattha yaṃ vadethāti yaṃ tumhe khemena sindhusovīradesapattiṃ tattha ca vipulaṃ uddayaṃ lābhaṃ paccāsīsantā “gantvā maya”ntiādīni vadatha.
atk-s0506a:3881_2: Sabbaṃ taṃ vo tumhākaṃ tatheva bhavissati,
atk-s0506a:3881_4: tumhe pana ito paṭṭhāya pāpāni kammāni pāṇātipātādīni vivajjayātha parivajjetha.
atk-s0506a:3882_0: Yaṃ pana upāsakaṃ anuggaṇhanto tesaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaṃ kātukāmo ahosi,
atk-s0506a:3882_1: tassa guṇaṃ kittetvā taṃ tesaṃ uddisanto imā gāthāyo āha –
atk-s0506a:3885_0: Saddho ca cāgī ca supesalo ca, vicakkhaṇo santusito mutīmā.
atk-s0506a:3887_0: “Sañjānamāno na musā bhaṇeyya, parūpaghātāya na cetayeyya;
atk-s0506a:3888_0: Vebhūtikaṃ pesuṇaṃ no kareyya, saṇhañca vācaṃ sakhilaṃ bhaṇeyya.
atk-s0506a:3891_0: So mātaraṃ pitarañcāpi jantu, dhammena poseti ariyavutti.
atk-s0506a:3893_0: “Maññe so mātāpitūnaṃ kāraṇā, bhogāni pariyesati na attahetu;
atk-s0506a:3894_0: Mātāpitūnañca yo accayena, nekkhammapoṇo carissati brahmacariyaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3896_0: “Ujū avaṅko asaṭho amāyo, na lesakappena ca vohareyya;
atk-s0506a:3897_0: So tādiso sukatakammakārī, dhamme ṭhito kinti labhetha dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3899_0: “Taṃkāraṇā pātukatomhi attanā, tasmā dhammaṃ passatha vāṇijāse;
atk-s0506a:3900_0: Aññatra teniha bhasmī bhavetha, andhākulā vippanaṭṭhā araññe;
atk-s0506a:3901_0: Taṃ khippamānena lahuṃ parena, sukho have sappurisena saṅgamo”ti.
atk-s0506a:3903_1: Sañjānamāno na musā bhaṇeyyāti sampajānamusā na bhāseyya.
atk-s0506a:3906_2: Na ca vohareyyāti māyāsāṭheyyavasena vacanaṃ na nicchāreyya.
atk-s0506a:3906_3: Dhamme ṭhito kinti labhetha dukkhanti evaṃ vuttanayena dhamme ṭhito dhammacārī samacārī kinti kena pakārena dukkhaṃ labhetha pāpuṇeyya.
atk-s0506a:3907_2: Pātukatomhi attanāti sayameva tumhākaṃ ahaṃ pāturahosiṃ.
atk-s0506a:3907_5: Tasmāti yasmā ahaṃ dhammaṃ apacāyamāno taṃ rakkhanto tumhepi rakkhāmi,
atk-s0506a:3907_6: tasmā dhammaṃ passatha dhammameva caritabbaṃ katvā oloketha.
atk-s0506a:3907_7: Aññatra teniha bhasmī bhavethāti tena upāsakena vinā ce āgatā,
atk-s0506a:3907_8: imasmiṃ marukantāre anāthā appaṭisaraṇā bhasmabhāvaṃ gaccheyyātha.
atk-s0506a:3907_14: So hi khantisoracce niviṭṭho kenaci kiñci vuttopi na paṭippharatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0506a:3908_0: Evaṃ sāmaññato kittitaṃ sarūpato ñātukāmā vāṇijā –
atk-s0506a:3911_0: Kiṃ nāmadheyyaṃ kiṃ pana tassa gottaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3912_0: Mayampi naṃ daṭṭhukāmamha yakkha, yassānukampāya idhāgatosi;
atk-s0506a:3913_0: Lābhā hi tassa yassa tuvaṃ pihesī”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3914_1: Tattha kiṃ nāma soti nāmato so jantu satto ko nāma.
atk-s0506a:3914_2: Kiñca karoti kammanti kasivaṇijjādīsu kīdisaṃ kammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0506a:3914_3: Kiṃ nāmadheyyanti mātāpitūhi kataṃ pana “tisso phusso”tiādīsu tassa kiṃ nāmadheyyaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3914_5: Yassa tuvaṃ pihesīti yaṃ tuvaṃ piyāyasi.
atk-s0506a:3920_0: Mā kho naṃ hīḷittha supesalo so”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3921_4: Tattha kocchaṃ nāma āḷakādisaṇṭhāpanatthaṃ kesādīnaṃ ullikhanasādhanaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3924_0: “Jānāmase yaṃ tvaṃ pavadesi yakkha, na kho naṃ jānāma sa edisoti;
atk-s0506a:3925_0: Mayampi naṃ pūjayissāma yakkha, sutvāna tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ uḷāra”nti.
atk-s0506a:3926_2: Edisoti guṇato pana yathā tayā kittitaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3926_3: evaṃ edisoti taṃ na kho jānāma,
atk-s0506a:3927_0: Idāni devaputto te attano vimānaṃ āropetvā anusāsanatthaṃ –
atk-s0506a:3929_0: “Ye keci imasmiṃ satthe manussā, daharā mahantā athavāpi majjhimā;
atk-s0506a:3930_0: Sabbeva te ālambantu vimānaṃ, passantu puññānaṃ phalaṃ kadariyā”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3931_0: Gāthamāha. Tattha mahantāti vuḍḍhā. Ālambantūti ārohantu. Kadariyāti maccharino adānasīlā.
atk-s0506a:3932_0: Idāni pariyosāne cha gāthā dhammasaṅgāhakehi vuttā –
atk-s0506a:3934_0: “Te tattha sabbeva ahaṃ pureti, taṃ kappakaṃ tattha purakkhatvā;
atk-s0506a:3935_0: Sabbeva te ālambiṃsu vimānaṃ, masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassa.
atk-s0506a:3937_0: “Te tattha sabbeva ahaṃ pureti, upāsakattaṃ paṭivedayiṃsu;
atk-s0506a:3938_0: Pāṇātipātā viratā ahesuṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayiṃsu;
atk-s0506a:3939_0: Amajjapā no ca musā bhaṇiṃsu, sakena dārena ca ahesuṃ tuṭṭhā.
atk-s0506a:3941_0: “Te tattha sabbeva ahaṃ pureti, upāsakattaṃ paṭivedayitvā;
atk-s0506a:3942_0: Pakkāmi sattho anumodamāno, yakkhiddhiyā anumato punappunaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3947_0: “Gantvāna te saṅgharaṃ sotthivanto, puttehi dārehi samaṅgibhūtā;
atk-s0506a:3948_0: Ānandī vittā sumanā patītā, akaṃsu serīsamahaṃ uḷāraṃ;
atk-s0506a:3952_0: Ekassa atthāya upāsakassa, sabbeva sattā sukhitā ahesu”nti.
atk-s0506a:3953_1: Tattha ahaṃ pureti ahaṃ purimaṃ ahaṃ purimanti ahamahaṃkarāti attho.
atk-s0506a:3953_2: “Te tattha sabbevā”ti vatvā puna “sabbeva te”ti vacanaṃ “sabbeva te yathā vimānassa āruhane ussukkajātā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0506a:3953_4: na kassaci āruhane antarāyo ahosī”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3953_5: Masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassāti “masakkasāra”nti ca tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0506a:3954_1: Atha te vāṇijā vimānaṃ passitvā pasannacittā tassa devaputtassa ovāde ṭhatvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0506a:3954_2: tassa ānubhāvena sotthinā icchitaṃ desaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0506a:3954_4: Tattha anumato pakkāmi sattho yakkhiddhiyā punappunaṃ anumodamānoti yojanā.
atk-s0506a:3956_4: Serīsakaṃ te pariveṇaṃ māpayiṃsūti kataññutāya ṭhatvā paṭissavamocanatthañca devaputtassa nāmena serīsakaṃ
atk-s0506a:3956_5: nāma paricchedavasena veṇiyato pekkhitabbato pariveṇaṃ pāsādakūṭāgārarattiṭṭhānādisampannaṃ pākāraparikkhittaṃ
atk-s0506a:3957_5: Ekassa sattassa hitatthaṃ sabbeva sattā sabbe eva te satthapariyāpannā sattā,
atk-s0506a:3958_0: Sambhavo pana upāsako pāyāsissa devaputtassa tesañca vāṇijānaṃ vacanapaṭivacanavasena pavattaṃ gāthābandhaṃ sutaniyāmeneva uggahetvā therānaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0506a:3958_2: Taṃ yasattherappamukhā mahātherā dutiyasaṅgītiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ āropesuṃ.
atk-s0506a:3958_3: Sambhavo pana upāsako mātāpitūnaṃ accayena pabbajitvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:3961_3: Tena samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva devacārikaṃ caranto tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ upagato.
atk-s0506a:3961_4: Tasmiñca khaṇe aññataro devaputto attano vimānadvāre ṭhito āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ disvā sañjātagāravabahumāno
atk-s0506a:3961_5: upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:3962_0: So kira atīte kassapasammāsambuddhe parinibbute tassa sarīradhātuyo pakkhipitvā yojanike kanakathūpe
atk-s0506a:3962_1: ca kate catasso parisā kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gandhapupphadhūpādīhi cetiye pūjaṃ karonti,
atk-s0506a:3962_2: tattha aññataro upāsako aññesu pupphapūjaṃ katvā gatesu tehi pūjitaṭṭhāne dunnikkhittāni pupphāni disvā
atk-s0506a:3962_3: tattheva tāni sammadeva ṭhapento sannivesavasena dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ vibhattivisesayuttaṃ pupphapūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0506a:3962_4: Katvā ca pana etaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhanto satthu guṇe anussaritvā pasannacitto taṃ puññaṃ hadaye ṭhapesi.
atk-s0506a:3963_0: So aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tasseva kammassa ānubhāvena tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti,
atk-s0506a:3963_2: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “tasmiñca khaṇe aññataro devaputto…pe…
atk-s0506a:3963_4: Atha naṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yathāladdhasampattikittanamukhena katasucaritakammaṃ imāhi gāthāhi pucchi –
atk-s0506a:3966_0: Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā.
atk-s0506a:3968_0: “Tatthacchasi pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ;
atk-s0506a:3969_0: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā.
atk-s0506a:3971_0: “Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati;
atk-s0506a:3972_0: Uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0506a:3974_0: “Pucchāmi taṃ deva mahānubhāva, manussabhūto kimakāsi puññaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3975_0: Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:3976_0: Sopi tassa attano katakammaṃ imāhi gāthāhi kathesi. Taṃ dassentā saṅgītikārā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0506a:3979_0: Pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ”.
atk-s0506a:3982_0: Mahiddhiko camhi mahānubhāvo, dibbehi kāmehi samaṅgibhūto.
atk-s0506a:3984_0: “Tena metādiso vaṇṇo, tena me idha mijjhati;
atk-s0506a:3985_0: Uppajjanti ca me bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0506a:3987_0: “Akkhāmi te bhikkhu mahānubhāva, manussabhūto yamahaṃ akāsiṃ;
atk-s0506a:3988_0: Tenamhi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:3989_1: Tattha dunnikkhittaṃ mālanti cetiye pūjākaraṇaṭṭhāne nirantaraṭṭhapanādinā racanāvisesena aṭṭhapetvā yathānikkhittatāya na suṭṭhu nikkhittaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3989_3: Sunikkhipitvāti suṭṭhu nikkhipitvā racanāvisesena dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ katvā nikkhipiya.
atk-s0506a:3989_5: Taṃ vā pupphaṃ nikkhipanto satthu cetiyaṃ uddissa mama santāne kusaladhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvāti evaṃ ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0506a:3990_0: Evaṃ devaputtena attano sucaritakamme pakāsite thero tassa dhammaṃ desetvā āgantvā bhagavato tamatthaṃ nivedesi.
atk-s0506a:3990_1: Bhagavā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattamahājanassa dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0506a:4006_0: Yā tattha paramatthānaṃ, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
atk-s0506a:4010_0: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
atk-s0506a:4015_0: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
